37  private bool enabled = true;
38  public bool Enabled
39  {
40  get
41  {
42  return enabled && !Removed;
43  }
44  set
45  {
46  if (value == enabled) return;
47 
48  if (Removed)
49  {
50  enabled = false;
51  return;
52  }
53 
54  enabled = value;
55 
56  foreach (Limb limb in AnimController.Limbs)
57  {
58  if (limb.IsSevered) { continue; }
59  if (limb.body != null)
60  {
61  limb.body.Enabled = enabled;
62  }
63  UpdateLimbLightSource(limb);
64  }
65  AnimController.Collider.Enabled = value;
66  }
67  }

75  public bool IsRemotelyControlled
76  {
77  get
78  {
79  if (GameMain.NetworkMember == null)
80  {
81  return false;
82  }
83  else if (GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient)
84  {
85  //all characters except the client's own character are controlled by the server
86  return this != Controlled;
87  }
88  else
89  {
90  return IsRemotePlayer;
91  }
92  }
93  }

155  protected readonly Dictionary<string, ActiveTeamChange> activeTeamChanges = new Dictionary<string, ActiveTeamChange>();
156  protected ActiveTeamChange currentTeamChange;
157  const string OriginalTeamIdentifier = "original";
158 
159  public static void ThrowIfAccessingWalletsInSingleplayer()
160  {
161 #if CLIENT && DEBUG
162  if (Screen.Selected is TestScreen) { return; }
163 #endif
164  if (GameMain.NetworkMember is null || GameMain.IsSingleplayer)
165  {
166  throw new InvalidOperationException($"Tried to access crew wallets in singleplayer. Use {nameof(CampaignMode)}.{nameof(CampaignMode.Bank)} or {nameof(CampaignMode)}.{nameof(CampaignMode.GetWallet)} instead.");
167  }
168  }
169 
170  public void SetOriginalTeam(CharacterTeamType newTeam)
171  {
172  TryRemoveTeamChange(OriginalTeamIdentifier);
173  currentTeamChange = new ActiveTeamChange(newTeam, ActiveTeamChange.TeamChangePriorities.Base);
174  TryAddNewTeamChange(OriginalTeamIdentifier, currentTeamChange);
175  }
176 
177  protected void ChangeTeam(CharacterTeamType newTeam)
178  {
179  if (newTeam == teamID)
180  {
181  return;
182  }
183  teamID = newTeam;
184  if (info != null) { info.TeamID = newTeam; }
185 
186  if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient)
187  {
188  return;
189  }
190  // clear up any duties the character might have had from its old team (autonomous objectives are automatically recreated)
191  var order = OrderPrefab.Dismissal.CreateInstance(OrderPrefab.OrderTargetType.Entity, orderGiver: this).WithManualPriority(CharacterInfo.HighestManualOrderPriority);
192  SetOrder(order, isNewOrder: true, speak: false);
193 
194 #if SERVER
195  GameMain.NetworkMember.CreateEntityEvent(this, new TeamChangeEventData());
196 #endif
197  }
198 
199  public bool HasTeamChange(string identifier)
200  {
201  return activeTeamChanges.ContainsKey(identifier);
202  }
203 
204  public bool TryAddNewTeamChange(string identifier, ActiveTeamChange newTeamChange)
205  {
206  bool success = activeTeamChanges.TryAdd(identifier, newTeamChange);
207  if (success)
208  {
209  if (currentTeamChange == null)
210  {
211  // set team logic to use active team changes as soon as the first team change is added
212  SetOriginalTeam(TeamID);
213  }
214  }
215  else
216  {
217 #if DEBUG
218  DebugConsole.ThrowError("Tried to add an existing team change! Make sure to check if the team change exists first.");
219 #endif
220  }
221  return success;
222  }
223  public bool TryRemoveTeamChange(string identifier)
224  {
225  if (activeTeamChanges.TryGetValue(identifier, out ActiveTeamChange removedTeamChange))
226  {
227  if (currentTeamChange == removedTeamChange)
228  {
229  currentTeamChange = activeTeamChanges[OriginalTeamIdentifier];
230  }
231  }
232  return activeTeamChanges.Remove(identifier);
233  }
234 
235  public void UpdateTeam()
236  {
237  if (currentTeamChange == null)
238  {
239  return;
240  }
241 
242  ActiveTeamChange bestTeamChange = currentTeamChange;
243  foreach (var desiredTeamChange in activeTeamChanges) // order of iteration matters because newest is preferred when multiple same-priority team changes exist
244  {
245  if (bestTeamChange.TeamChangePriority < desiredTeamChange.Value.TeamChangePriority)
246  {
247  bestTeamChange = desiredTeamChange.Value;
248  }
249  }
250  if (TeamID != bestTeamChange.DesiredTeamId)
251  {
252  ChangeTeam(bestTeamChange.DesiredTeamId);
253  currentTeamChange = bestTeamChange;
254 
255  if (bestTeamChange.AggressiveBehavior) // this seemed like the least disruptive way to induce aggressive behavior
256  {
257  var order = OrderPrefab.Prefabs["fightintruders"].CreateInstance(OrderPrefab.OrderTargetType.Entity, orderGiver: this).WithManualPriority(CharacterInfo.HighestManualOrderPriority);
258  SetOrder(order, isNewOrder: true, speak: false);
259  }
260  }
261  }

374  public Vector2 AimRefPosition
375  {
376  get
377  {
378  if (ViewTarget == null) { return AnimController.AimSourcePos; }
379 
380  Vector2 viewTargetWorldPos = ViewTarget.WorldPosition;
381  if (ViewTarget is Item targetItem)
382  {
383  Turret turret = targetItem.GetComponent<Turret>();
384  if (turret != null)
385  {
386  viewTargetWorldPos = new Vector2(
387  targetItem.WorldRect.X + turret.TransformedBarrelPos.X,
388  targetItem.WorldRect.Y - turret.TransformedBarrelPos.Y);
389  }
390  }
391  return Position + (viewTargetWorldPos - WorldPosition);
392  }
393  }

421  public string DisplayName
422  {
423  get
424  {
425  if (IsPet)
426  {
427  string petName = (AIController as EnemyAIController).PetBehavior.GetTagName();
428  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(petName)) { return petName; }
429  }
430 
431  if (info != null && !string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(info.Name)) { return info.Name; }
432  LocalizedString displayName = Params.DisplayName;
433  if (displayName.IsNullOrWhiteSpace())
434  {
435  if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(Params.SpeciesTranslationOverride))
436  {
437  displayName = TextManager.Get($"Character.{SpeciesName}");
438  }
439  else
440  {
441  displayName = TextManager.Get($"Character.{Params.SpeciesTranslationOverride}");
442  }
443  }
444  return displayName.IsNullOrWhiteSpace() ? Name : displayName.Value;
445  }
446  }

552  public Character SelectedCharacter
553  {
554  get { return selectedCharacter; }
555  set
556  {
557  if (value == selectedCharacter) return;
558  if (selectedCharacter != null)
559  selectedCharacter.selectedBy = null;
560  selectedCharacter = value;
561  if (selectedCharacter != null)
562  selectedCharacter.selectedBy = this;
563 
564 #if CLIENT
565  CharacterHealth.SetHealthBarVisibility(value == null);
566 #elif SERVER
567  if (value is { IsDead: true, Wallet: { Balance: var balance } grabbedWallet } && balance > 0)
568  {
569  if (GameMain.GameSession.Campaign is MultiPlayerCampaign mpCampaign)
570  {
571  mpCampaign.Bank.Give(balance);
572  }
573 
574  grabbedWallet.Deduct(balance);
575  GameServer.Log($"{GameServer.CharacterLogName(this)} grabbed {value.Name}'s body and received {grabbedWallet.Balance} mk.", ServerLog.MessageType.Money);
576  }
577 #endif
578  }
579  }

780  private Item _selectedConstruction;
781  public Item SelectedConstruction
782  {
783  get => _selectedConstruction;
784  set
785  {
786  var prevSelectedConstruction = _selectedConstruction;
787  _selectedConstruction = value;
788 #if CLIENT
789  HintManager.OnSetSelectedConstruction(this, prevSelectedConstruction, _selectedConstruction);
790  if (Controlled == this)
791  {
792  if (_selectedConstruction == null)
793  {
794  GameMain.GameSession?.CrewManager?.ResetCrewList();
795  }
796  else if (_selectedConstruction.GetComponent<Ladder>() == null)
797  {
798  GameMain.GameSession?.CrewManager?.AutoHideCrewList();
799  }
800  }
801 #endif
802  if (prevSelectedConstruction == null && _selectedConstruction != null)
803  {
804  itemSelectedTime = Timing.TotalTime;
805  }
806  else if (prevSelectedConstruction != null && _selectedConstruction == null && itemSelectedTime > 0)
807  {
808  if (!itemSelectedDurations.ContainsKey(prevSelectedConstruction.Prefab))
809  {
810  itemSelectedDurations.Add(prevSelectedConstruction.Prefab, 0);
811  }
812  itemSelectedDurations[prevSelectedConstruction.Prefab] += Timing.TotalTime - itemSelectedTime;
813  itemSelectedTime = 0;
814  }
815  }
816  }

835  private bool isDead;
836  public bool IsDead
837  {
838  get { return isDead; }
839  set
840  {
841  if (isDead == value) { return; }
842  if (value)
843  {
844  Kill(CauseOfDeathType.Unknown, causeOfDeathAffliction: null);
845  }
846  else
847  {
848  Revive();
849  }
850  }
851  }

885  {
886  get

889  if (!Inventory.AccessibleWhenAlive)
890  {
891  return IsDead;
892  }
893  else
894  {
895  return IsKnockedDown || LockHands || IsBot && IsOnPlayerTeam;
896  }
897  }
898  set { canInventoryBeAccessed = value; }
899  }

916  private bool accessRemovedCharacterErrorShown;
917  public override Vector2 SimPosition
918  {
919  get
920  {
921  if (AnimController?.Collider == null)
922  {
923  if (!accessRemovedCharacterErrorShown)
924  {
925  string errorMsg = "Attempted to access a potentially removed character. Character: [name], id: " + ID + ", removed: " + Removed + ".";
926  if (AnimController == null)
927  {
928  errorMsg += " AnimController == null";
929  }
930  else if (AnimController.Collider == null)
931  {
932  errorMsg += " AnimController.Collider == null";
933  }
934  errorMsg += '\n' + Environment.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace();
935  DebugConsole.NewMessage(errorMsg.Replace("[name]", Name), Color.Red);
936  GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce(
937  "Character.SimPosition:AccessRemoved",
938  GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Error,
939  errorMsg.Replace("[name]", SpeciesName.Value) + "\n" + Environment.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace());
940  accessRemovedCharacterErrorShown = true;
941  }
942  return Vector2.Zero;
943  }
944 
945  return AnimController.Collider.SimPosition;
946  }
947  }

1006  public static Character Create(Identifier speciesName, Vector2 position, string seed, CharacterInfo characterInfo = null, ushort id = Entity.NullEntityID, bool isRemotePlayer = false, bool hasAi = true, bool createNetworkEvent = true, RagdollParams ragdoll = null)

1017  public static Character Create(CharacterPrefab prefab, Vector2 position, string seed, CharacterInfo characterInfo = null, ushort id = Entity.NullEntityID, bool isRemotePlayer = false, bool hasAi = true, bool createNetworkEvent = true, RagdollParams ragdoll = null)
1018  {
1019  Character newCharacter = null;
1020  if (prefab.Identifier != CharacterPrefab.HumanSpeciesName)
1021  {
1022  var aiCharacter = new AICharacter(prefab, position, seed, characterInfo, id, isRemotePlayer, ragdoll);
1023  var ai = new EnemyAIController(aiCharacter, seed);
1024  aiCharacter.SetAI(ai);
1025  newCharacter = aiCharacter;
1026  }
1027  else if (hasAi)
1028  {
1029  var aiCharacter = new AICharacter(prefab, position, seed, characterInfo, id, isRemotePlayer, ragdoll);
1030  var ai = new HumanAIController(aiCharacter);
1031  aiCharacter.SetAI(ai);
1032  newCharacter = aiCharacter;
1033  }
1034  else
1035  {
1036  newCharacter = new Character(prefab, position, seed, characterInfo, id, isRemotePlayer, ragdoll);
1037  }
1038 
1039 #if SERVER
1040  if (GameMain.Server != null && Spawner != null && createNetworkEvent)
1041  {
1042  Spawner.CreateNetworkEvent(new EntitySpawner.SpawnEntity(newCharacter));
1043  }
1044 #endif
1045 
1046  GameMain.LuaCs.Hook.Call("character.created", new object[] { newCharacter });
1047 
1048  return newCharacter;
1049  }

1053  wallet = new Wallet(Option<Character>.Some(this));

1055 
1056  protected Character(CharacterPrefab prefab, Vector2 position, string seed, CharacterInfo characterInfo = null, ushort id = Entity.NullEntityID, bool isRemotePlayer = false, RagdollParams ragdollParams = null)
1057  : this(null, id)
1058  {
1059  this.Seed = seed;
1060  this.Prefab = prefab;
1061  MTRandom random = new MTRandom(ToolBox.StringToInt(seed));
1062 
1063  IsRemotePlayer = isRemotePlayer;
1064 
1065  oxygenAvailable = 100.0f;
1066  aiTarget = new AITarget(this);
1067 
1068  lowPassMultiplier = 1.0f;
1069 
1070  Properties = SerializableProperty.GetProperties(this);
1071 
1072  Params = new CharacterParams(prefab.ContentFile as CharacterFile);
1073 
1074  Info = characterInfo;
1075 
1076  Identifier speciesName = prefab.Identifier;
1077 
1078  if (VariantOf == CharacterPrefab.HumanSpeciesName || speciesName == CharacterPrefab.HumanSpeciesName)
1079  {
1080  if (!VariantOf.IsEmpty)
1081  {
1082  DebugConsole.ThrowError("The variant system does not yet support humans, sorry. It does support other humanoids though!");
1083  }
1084  if (characterInfo == null)
1085  {
1086  Info = new CharacterInfo(CharacterPrefab.HumanSpeciesName);
1087  }
1088  }
1089  if (Info != null)
1090  {
1091  teamID = Info.TeamID;
1092  }
1093  keys = new Key[Enum.GetNames(typeof(InputType)).Length];
1094  for (int i = 0; i < Enum.GetNames(typeof(InputType)).Length; i++)
1095  {
1096  keys[i] = new Key((InputType)i);
1097  }
1098 
1099  var mainElement = prefab.ConfigElement;
1100  InitProjSpecific(mainElement);
1101 
1102  List<ContentXElement> inventoryElements = new List<ContentXElement>();
1103  List<float> inventoryCommonness = new List<float>();
1104  List<ContentXElement> healthElements = new List<ContentXElement>();
1105  List<float> healthCommonness = new List<float>();
1106  foreach (var subElement in mainElement.Elements())
1107  {
1108  switch (subElement.Name.ToString().ToLowerInvariant())
1109  {
1110  case "inventory":
1111  inventoryElements.Add(subElement);
1112  inventoryCommonness.Add(subElement.GetAttributeFloat("commonness", 1.0f));
1113  break;
1114  case "health":
1115  healthElements.Add(subElement);
1116  healthCommonness.Add(subElement.GetAttributeFloat("commonness", 1.0f));
1117  break;
1118  case "statuseffect":
1119  var statusEffect = StatusEffect.Load(subElement, Name);
1120  if (statusEffect != null)
1121  {
1122  if (!statusEffects.ContainsKey(statusEffect.type))
1123  {
1124  statusEffects.Add(statusEffect.type, new List<StatusEffect>());
1125  }
1126  statusEffects[statusEffect.type].Add(statusEffect);
1127  }
1128  break;
1129  }
1130  }
1131  if (Params.VariantFile != null)
1132  {
1133  var overrideElement = Params.VariantFile.Root.FromPackage(Params.MainElement.ContentPackage);
1134  // Only override if the override file contains matching elements
1135  if (overrideElement.GetChildElement("inventory") != null)
1136  {
1137  inventoryElements.Clear();
1138  inventoryCommonness.Clear();
1139  foreach (var subElement in overrideElement.GetChildElements("inventory"))
1140  {
1141  switch (subElement.Name.ToString().ToLowerInvariant())
1142  {
1143  case "inventory":
1144  inventoryElements.Add(subElement);
1145  inventoryCommonness.Add(subElement.GetAttributeFloat("commonness", 1.0f));
1146  break;
1147  }
1148  }
1149  }
1150  if (overrideElement.GetChildElement("health") != null)
1151  {
1152  healthElements.Clear();
1153  healthCommonness.Clear();
1154  foreach (var subElement in overrideElement.GetChildElements("health"))
1155  {
1156  healthElements.Add(subElement);
1157  healthCommonness.Add(subElement.GetAttributeFloat("commonness", 1.0f));
1158  }
1159  }
1160  }
1161 
1162  if (inventoryElements.Count > 0)
1163  {
1164  Inventory = new CharacterInventory(
1165  inventoryElements.Count == 1 ? inventoryElements[0] : ToolBox.SelectWeightedRandom(inventoryElements, inventoryCommonness, random),
1166  this);
1167  }
1168  if (healthElements.Count == 0)
1169  {
1170  CharacterHealth = new CharacterHealth(this);
1171  }
1172  else
1173  {
1174  var selectedHealthElement = healthElements.Count == 1 ? healthElements[0] : ToolBox.SelectWeightedRandom(healthElements, healthCommonness, random);
1175  // If there's no limb elements defined in the override variant, let's use the limb health definitions of the original file.
1176  var limbHealthElement = selectedHealthElement;
1177  if (Params.VariantFile != null && limbHealthElement.GetChildElement("limb") == null)
1178  {
1179  limbHealthElement = Params.OriginalElement.GetChildElement("health");
1180  }
1181  CharacterHealth = new CharacterHealth(selectedHealthElement, this, limbHealthElement);
1182  }
1183 
1184  if (Params.Husk && speciesName != "husk")
1185  {
1186  // Get the non husked name and find the ragdoll with it
1187  var matchingAffliction = AfflictionPrefab.List
1188  .Where(p => p is AfflictionPrefabHusk)
1189  .Select(p => p as AfflictionPrefabHusk)
1190  .FirstOrDefault(p => p.TargetSpecies.Any(t => t == AfflictionHusk.GetNonHuskedSpeciesName(speciesName, p)));
1191  Identifier nonHuskedSpeciesName = Identifier.Empty;
1192  if (matchingAffliction == null)
1193  {
1194  DebugConsole.ThrowError("Cannot find a husk infection that matches this species! Please add the speciesnames as 'targets' in the husk affliction prefab definition!");
1195  // Crashes if we fail to create a ragdoll -> Let's just use some ragdoll so that the user sees the error msg.
1196  nonHuskedSpeciesName = IsHumanoid ? CharacterPrefab.HumanSpeciesName : "crawler".ToIdentifier();
1197  speciesName = nonHuskedSpeciesName;
1198  }
1199  else
1200  {
1201  nonHuskedSpeciesName = AfflictionHusk.GetNonHuskedSpeciesName(speciesName, matchingAffliction);
1202  }
1203  if (ragdollParams == null && prefab.VariantOf == null)
1204  {
1205  Identifier name = Params.UseHuskAppendage ? nonHuskedSpeciesName : speciesName;
1206  ragdollParams = IsHumanoid ? RagdollParams.GetDefaultRagdollParams<HumanRagdollParams>(name) : RagdollParams.GetDefaultRagdollParams<FishRagdollParams>(name) as RagdollParams;
1207  }
1208  if (Params.HasInfo && info == null)
1209  {
1210  info = new CharacterInfo(nonHuskedSpeciesName);
1211  }
1212  }
1213  else if (Params.HasInfo && info == null)
1214  {
1215  info = new CharacterInfo(speciesName);
1216  }
1217 
1218  if (IsHumanoid)
1219  {
1220  AnimController = new HumanoidAnimController(this, seed, ragdollParams as HumanRagdollParams)
1221  {
1222  TargetDir = Direction.Right
1223  };
1224  }
1225  else
1226  {
1227  AnimController = new FishAnimController(this, seed, ragdollParams as FishRagdollParams);
1228  PressureProtection = int.MaxValue;
1229  }
1230 
1231  AnimController.SetPosition(ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(position));
1232 
1233  AnimController.FindHull(null);
1234  if (AnimController.CurrentHull != null) { Submarine = AnimController.CurrentHull.Submarine; }
1235 
1236  CharacterList.Add(this);
1237 
1238  //characters start disabled in the multiplayer mode, and are enabled if/when
1239  // - controlled by the player
1240  // - client receives a position update from the server
1241  // - server receives an input message from the client controlling the character
1242  // - if an AICharacter, the server enables it when close enough to any of the players
1243  Enabled = GameMain.NetworkMember == null;
1244 
1245  if (info != null)
1246  {
1247  LoadHeadAttachments();
1248  }
1249  ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.OnSpawn, 1.0f);
1250  }
1251  partial void InitProjSpecific(ContentXElement mainElement);

1253  public void ReloadHead(int? headId = null, int hairIndex = -1, int beardIndex = -1, int moustacheIndex = -1, int faceAttachmentIndex = -1)
1254  {
1255  if (Info == null) { return; }
1256  var head = AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.Head);
1257  if (head == null) { return; }
1258  HashSet<Identifier> tags = Info.Head.Preset.TagSet.ToHashSet();
1259  if (headId.HasValue)
1260  {
1261  tags.RemoveWhere(t => t.StartsWith("variant"));
1262  tags.Add($"variant{headId.Value}".ToIdentifier());
1263  }
1264  Info.RecreateHead(tags.ToImmutableHashSet(), hairIndex, beardIndex, moustacheIndex, faceAttachmentIndex);
1265 #if CLIENT
1266  head.RecreateSprites();
1267 #endif
1268  LoadHeadAttachments();
1269  }
1270 
1271  public void LoadHeadAttachments()
1272  {
1273  if (Info == null) { return; }
1274  if (AnimController == null) { return; }
1275  var head = AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.Head);
1276  if (head == null) { return; }
1277  // Note that if there are any other wearables on the head, they are removed here.
1278  head.OtherWearables.ForEach(w => w.Sprite.Remove());
1279  head.OtherWearables.Clear();
1280 
1281  //if the element has not been set at this point, the character has no hair and the index should be zero (= no hair)
1282  if (info.Head.FaceAttachment == null) { info.Head.FaceAttachmentIndex = 0; }
1283  Info.Head.FaceAttachment?.GetChildElements("sprite").ForEach(s => head.OtherWearables.Add(new WearableSprite(s, WearableType.FaceAttachment)));
1284  if (info.Head.BeardElement == null) { info.Head.BeardIndex = 0; }
1285  Info.Head.BeardElement?.GetChildElements("sprite").ForEach(s => head.OtherWearables.Add(new WearableSprite(s, WearableType.Beard)));
1286  if (info.Head.MoustacheElement == null) { info.Head.MoustacheIndex = 0; }
1287  Info.Head.MoustacheElement?.GetChildElements("sprite").ForEach(s => head.OtherWearables.Add(new WearableSprite(s, WearableType.Moustache)));
1288  if (info.Head.HairElement == null) { info.Head.HairIndex = 0; }
1289  Info.Head.HairElement?.GetChildElements("sprite").ForEach(s => head.OtherWearables.Add(new WearableSprite(s, WearableType.Hair)));
1290 
1291 #if CLIENT
1292  if (info.Head?.HairWithHatElement?.GetChildElement("sprite") != null)
1293  {
1294  head.HairWithHatSprite = new WearableSprite(info.Head.HairWithHatElement.GetChildElement("sprite"), WearableType.Hair);
1295  }
1296  head.EnableHuskSprite = Params.Husk;
1297  head.LoadHerpesSprite();
1298  head.UpdateWearableTypesToHide();
1299 #endif
1300  }

1302  public bool IsKeyHit(InputType inputType)
1303  {
1304 #if SERVER
1305  if (GameMain.Server != null && IsRemotePlayer)
1306  {
1307  switch (inputType)
1308  {
1309  case InputType.Left:
1310  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Left) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Left);
1311  case InputType.Right:
1312  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Right) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Right);
1313  case InputType.Up:
1314  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Up) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Up);
1315  case InputType.Down:
1316  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Down) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Down);
1317  case InputType.Run:
1318  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Run) && prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Run);
1319  case InputType.Crouch:
1320  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Crouch) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Crouch);
1321  case InputType.Select:
1322  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Select); //TODO: clean up the way this input is registered
1323  case InputType.Deselect:
1324  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Deselect);
1325  case InputType.Health:
1326  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Health);
1327  case InputType.Grab:
1328  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Grab);
1329  case InputType.Use:
1330  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Use) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Use);
1331  case InputType.Shoot:
1332  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Shoot) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Shoot);
1333  case InputType.Ragdoll:
1334  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Ragdoll) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Ragdoll);
1335  default:
1336  return false;
1337  }
1338  }
1339 #endif
1340 
1341  return keys[(int)inputType].Hit;
1342  }
1343 
1344  public bool IsKeyDown(InputType inputType)
1345  {
1346 #if SERVER
1347  if (GameMain.Server != null && IsRemotePlayer)
1348  {
1349  switch (inputType)
1350  {
1351  case InputType.Left:
1352  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Left);
1353  case InputType.Right:
1354  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Right);
1355  case InputType.Up:
1356  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Up);
1357  case InputType.Down:
1358  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Down);
1359  case InputType.Run:
1360  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Run);
1361  case InputType.Crouch:
1362  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Crouch);
1363  case InputType.Select:
1364  return false; //TODO: clean up the way this input is registered
1365  case InputType.Deselect:
1366  return false;
1367  case InputType.Aim:
1368  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Aim);
1369  case InputType.Use:
1370  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Use);
1371  case InputType.Shoot:
1372  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Shoot);
1373  case InputType.Attack:
1374  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Attack);
1375  case InputType.Ragdoll:
1376  return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Ragdoll);
1377  }
1378  return false;
1379  }
1380 #endif
1381  if (inputType == InputType.Up || inputType == InputType.Down ||
1382  inputType == InputType.Left || inputType == InputType.Right)
1383  {
1384  var invertControls = CharacterHealth.GetAffliction("invertcontrols");
1385  if (invertControls != null)
1386  {
1387  switch (inputType)
1388  {
1389  case InputType.Left:
1390  inputType = InputType.Right;
1391  break;
1392  case InputType.Right:
1393  inputType = InputType.Left;
1394  break;
1395  case InputType.Up:
1396  inputType = InputType.Down;
1397  break;
1398  case InputType.Down:
1399  inputType = InputType.Up;
1400  break;
1401  }
1402  }
1403  }
1404 
1405  return keys[(int)inputType].Held;
1406  }

1428  }

1448  public void GiveIdCardTags(WayPoint spawnPoint, bool createNetworkEvent = false)

1469  public float GetSkillLevel(Identifier skillIdentifier)
1470  {
1471  if (Info?.Job == null) { return 0.0f; }
1472  float skillLevel = Info.Job.GetSkillLevel(skillIdentifier);
1473 
1474  // apply multipliers first so that multipliers only affect base skill value
1475  foreach (Affliction affliction in CharacterHealth.GetAllAfflictions())
1476  {
1477  skillLevel *= affliction.GetSkillMultiplier();
1478  }
1479 
1480  if (skillIdentifier != null)
1481  {
1482  for (int i = 0; i < Inventory.Capacity; i++)
1483  {
1484  if (Inventory.SlotTypes[i] != InvSlotType.Any && Inventory.GetItemAt(i)?.GetComponent<Wearable>() is Wearable wearable)
1485  {
1486  if (wearable.SkillModifiers.TryGetValue(skillIdentifier, out float skillValue))
1487  {
1488  skillLevel += skillValue;
1489  }
1490  }
1491  }
1492  }
1493 
1494  skillLevel += GetStatValue(GetSkillStatType(skillIdentifier));
1495 
1496  return skillLevel;
1497  }

1499  // TODO: reposition? there's also the overrideTargetMovement variable, but it's not in the same manner

1501  public bool ForceRun { get; set; }
1502 
1503  public bool IsClimbing => AnimController.Anim == AnimController.Animation.Climbing;
1504 
1505  public Vector2 GetTargetMovement()
1506  {
1507  Vector2 targetMovement = Vector2.Zero;
1508  if (OverrideMovement.HasValue)
1509  {
1510  targetMovement = OverrideMovement.Value;
1511  }
1512  else
1513  {
1514  if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Left)) { targetMovement.X -= 1.0f; }
1515  if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Right)) { targetMovement.X += 1.0f; }
1516  if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Up)) { targetMovement.Y += 1.0f; }
1517  if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Down)) { targetMovement.Y -= 1.0f; }
1518  }
1519  bool run = false;
1520  if ((IsKeyDown(InputType.Run) && AnimController.ForceSelectAnimationType == AnimationType.NotDefined) || ForceRun)
1521  {
1522 
1523  run = CanRun;
1524  }
1525  return ApplyMovementLimits(targetMovement, AnimController.GetCurrentSpeed(run));
1526  }
1527 
1528  //can't run if
1529  // - dragging someone
1530  // - crouching
1531  // - moving backwards
1532  public bool CanRun => (SelectedCharacter == null || !SelectedCharacter.CanBeDragged || HasAbilityFlag(AbilityFlags.MoveNormallyWhileDragging)) &&
1533  (!(AnimController is HumanoidAnimController) || !((HumanoidAnimController)AnimController).Crouching) &&
1534  !AnimController.IsMovingBackwards && !HasAbilityFlag(AbilityFlags.MustWalk);
1535 
1536  public Vector2 ApplyMovementLimits(Vector2 targetMovement, float currentSpeed)
1537  {
1538  //the vertical component is only used for falling through platforms and climbing ladders when not in water,
1539  //so the movement can't be normalized or the Character would walk slower when pressing down/up
1540  if (AnimController.InWater)
1541  {
1542  float length = targetMovement.Length();
1543  if (length > 0.0f)
1544  {
1545  targetMovement /= length;
1546  }
1547  }
1548  targetMovement *= currentSpeed;
1549  float maxSpeed = ApplyTemporarySpeedLimits(currentSpeed);
1550  targetMovement.X = MathHelper.Clamp(targetMovement.X, -maxSpeed, maxSpeed);
1551  targetMovement.Y = MathHelper.Clamp(targetMovement.Y, -maxSpeed, maxSpeed);
1552  SpeedMultiplier = greatestPositiveSpeedMultiplier - (1f - greatestNegativeSpeedMultiplier);
1553  targetMovement *= SpeedMultiplier;
1554  // Reset, status effects will set the value before the next update
1555  ResetSpeedMultiplier();
1556  return targetMovement;
1557  }
1558 
1559  private float greatestNegativeSpeedMultiplier = 1f;
1560  private float greatestPositiveSpeedMultiplier = 1f;
1561 
1565  public float SpeedMultiplier { get; private set; } = 1;
1566 
1567 
1568  private double propulsionSpeedMultiplierLastSet;
1569  private float propulsionSpeedMultiplier;
1573  public float PropulsionSpeedMultiplier
1574  {
1575  get { return propulsionSpeedMultiplier; }
1576  set
1577  {
1578  propulsionSpeedMultiplier = value;
1579  propulsionSpeedMultiplierLastSet = Timing.TotalTime;
1580  }
1581  }
1582 
1583  public void StackSpeedMultiplier(float val)
1584  {
1585  if (val < 1f)
1586  {
1587  if (val < greatestNegativeSpeedMultiplier)
1588  {
1589  greatestNegativeSpeedMultiplier = val;
1590  }
1591  }
1592  else
1593  {
1594  if (val > greatestPositiveSpeedMultiplier)
1595  {
1596  greatestPositiveSpeedMultiplier = val;
1597  }
1598  }
1599  }
1600 
1601  public void ResetSpeedMultiplier()
1602  {
1603  greatestPositiveSpeedMultiplier = 1f;
1604  greatestNegativeSpeedMultiplier = 1f;
1605  if (Timing.TotalTime > propulsionSpeedMultiplierLastSet + 0.1)
1606  {
1607  propulsionSpeedMultiplier = 1.0f;
1608  }
1609  }

1611  private float greatestNegativeHealthMultiplier = 1f;
1612  private float greatestPositiveHealthMultiplier = 1f;

1620  {
1621  if (val < 1f)
1622  {
1623  if (val < greatestNegativeHealthMultiplier)
1624  {
1625  greatestNegativeHealthMultiplier = val;
1626  }
1627  }
1628  else
1629  {
1630  if (val > greatestPositiveHealthMultiplier)
1631  {
1632  greatestPositiveHealthMultiplier = val;
1633  }
1634  }
1635  }
1636 
1637  private void CalculateHealthMultiplier()
1638  {
1639  HealthMultiplier = greatestPositiveHealthMultiplier - (1f - greatestNegativeHealthMultiplier);
1640  // Reset, status effects should set the values again, if the conditions match
1641  greatestPositiveHealthMultiplier = 1f;
1642  greatestNegativeHealthMultiplier = 1f;
1643  }

1658  public float GetTemporarySpeedReduction()
1659  {
1660  float reduction = 0;
1661  reduction = CalculateMovementPenalty(AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.RightFoot, excludeSevered: false), reduction);
1662  reduction = CalculateMovementPenalty(AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.LeftFoot, excludeSevered: false), reduction);
1663  if (AnimController is HumanoidAnimController)
1664  {
1665  if (AnimController.InWater)
1666  {
1667  // Currently only humans use hands for swimming.
1668  reduction = CalculateMovementPenalty(AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.RightHand, excludeSevered: false), reduction);
1669  reduction = CalculateMovementPenalty(AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.LeftHand, excludeSevered: false), reduction);
1670  }
1671  }
1672  else
1673  {
1674  int totalTailLimbs = 0;
1675  int destroyedTailLimbs = 0;
1676  foreach (var limb in AnimController.Limbs)
1677  {
1678  if (limb.type == LimbType.Tail)
1679  {
1680  totalTailLimbs++;
1681  if (limb.IsSevered)
1682  {
1683  destroyedTailLimbs++;
1684  }
1685  }
1686  }
1687  if (destroyedTailLimbs > 0)
1688  {
1689  reduction += MathHelper.Lerp(0, AnimController.InWater ? 1f : 0.5f, (float)destroyedTailLimbs / totalTailLimbs);
1690  }
1691  }
1692  return Math.Clamp(reduction, 0, 1f);
1693  }
1694 
1695  private float CalculateMovementPenalty(Limb limb, float sum, float max = 0.8f)
1696  {
1697  if (limb != null)
1698  {
1699  sum += MathHelper.Lerp(0, max, CharacterHealth.GetLimbDamage(limb, afflictionType: "damage"));
1700  }
1701  return Math.Clamp(sum, 0, 1f);
1702  }
1703 
1704  public float GetRightHandPenalty() => CalculateMovementPenalty(AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.RightHand, excludeSevered: false), 0, max: 1);
1705  public float GetLeftHandPenalty() => CalculateMovementPenalty(AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.LeftHand, excludeSevered: false), 0, max: 1);
1706 
1707  public float GetLegPenalty(float startSum = 0)
1708  {
1709  float sum = startSum;
1710  foreach (var limb in AnimController.Limbs)
1711  {
1712  switch (limb.type)
1713  {
1714  case LimbType.RightFoot:
1715  case LimbType.LeftFoot:
1716  sum += CalculateMovementPenalty(limb, sum, max: 0.5f);
1717  break;
1718  }
1719  }
1720  return Math.Clamp(sum, 0, 1f);
1721  }
1722 
1723  public float ApplyTemporarySpeedLimits(float speed)
1724  {
1725  float max;
1726  if (AnimController is HumanoidAnimController)
1727  {
1728  max = AnimController.InWater ? 0.5f : 0.8f;
1729  }
1730  else
1731  {
1732  max = AnimController.InWater ? 0.9f : 0.5f;
1733  }
1734  speed *= 1f - MathHelper.Lerp(0, max, GetTemporarySpeedReduction());
1735  return speed;
1736  }

1738  public void Control(float deltaTime, Camera cam)
1739  {
1740  ViewTarget = null;
1741  if (!AllowInput) { return; }
1742 
1743  if (Controlled == this || (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsServer))
1744  {
1745  SmoothedCursorPosition = cursorPosition;
1746  }
1747  else
1748  {
1749  //apply some smoothing to the cursor positions of remote players when playing as a client
1750  //to make aiming look a little less choppy
1751  Vector2 smoothedCursorDiff = cursorPosition - SmoothedCursorPosition;
1752  smoothedCursorDiff = NetConfig.InterpolateCursorPositionError(smoothedCursorDiff);
1753  SmoothedCursorPosition = cursorPosition - smoothedCursorDiff;
1754  }
1755 
1756  bool aiControlled = this is AICharacter && Controlled != this && !IsRemotelyControlled;
1757  if (!aiControlled)
1758  {
1759  Vector2 targetMovement = GetTargetMovement();
1760  AnimController.TargetMovement = targetMovement;
1761  AnimController.IgnorePlatforms = AnimController.TargetMovement.Y < -0.1f;
1762  }
1763 
1764  if (AnimController is HumanoidAnimController humanAnimController)
1765  {
1766  humanAnimController.Crouching = humanAnimController.ForceSelectAnimationType == AnimationType.Crouch || IsKeyDown(InputType.Crouch);
1767  }
1768 
1769  if (!aiControlled &&
1770  AnimController.Anim != AnimController.Animation.UsingConstruction &&
1771  AnimController.Anim != AnimController.Animation.CPR &&
1772  (GameMain.NetworkMember == null || !GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient || Controlled == this) &&
1773  AnimController.OnGround && !AnimController.InWater)
1774  {
1775  if (dontFollowCursor)
1776  {
1777  AnimController.TargetDir = Direction.Right;
1778  }
1779  else
1780  {
1781  // Values lower than this seem to cause constantious flipping when the mouse is near the player and the player is running, because the root collider moves after flipping.
1782  float followMargin = 40;
1783  if (CursorPosition.X < AnimController.Collider.Position.X - followMargin)
1784  {
1785  AnimController.TargetDir = Direction.Left;
1786  }
1787  else if (CursorPosition.X > AnimController.Collider.Position.X + followMargin)
1788  {
1789  AnimController.TargetDir = Direction.Right;
1790  }
1791  }
1792  }
1793 
1794  if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null)
1795  {
1796  if (GameMain.NetworkMember.IsServer)
1797  {
1798  if (!aiControlled)
1799  {
1800  if (dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.FacingLeft))
1801  {
1802  AnimController.TargetDir = Direction.Left;
1803  }
1804  else
1805  {
1806  AnimController.TargetDir = Direction.Right;
1807  }
1808  }
1809  }
1810  else if (GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient && Controlled != this)
1811  {
1812  if (memState.Count > 0)
1813  {
1814  AnimController.TargetDir = memState[0].Direction;
1815  }
1816  }
1817  }
1818 
1819 #if DEBUG && CLIENT
1820  if (PlayerInput.KeyHit(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Input.Keys.F))
1821  {
1822  AnimController.ReleaseStuckLimbs();
1823  if (AIController != null && AIController is EnemyAIController enemyAI)
1824  {
1825  enemyAI.LatchOntoAI?.DeattachFromBody(reset: true);
1826  }
1827  }
1828 #endif
1829  if (attackCoolDown > 0.0f)
1830  {
1831  attackCoolDown -= deltaTime;
1832  }
1833  else if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Attack))
1834  {
1835  if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient && Controlled != this)
1836  {
1837  if ((currentAttackTarget.DamageTarget as Entity)?.Removed ?? false)
1838  {
1839  currentAttackTarget = default(AttackTargetData);
1840  }
1841  currentAttackTarget.AttackLimb?.UpdateAttack(deltaTime, currentAttackTarget.AttackPos, currentAttackTarget.DamageTarget, out _);
1842  }
1843  else if (IsPlayer)
1844  {
1845  float dist = -1;
1846  Vector2 attackPos = SimPosition + ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(cursorPosition - Position);
1847  List<Body> ignoredBodies = AnimController.Limbs.Select(l => l.body.FarseerBody).ToList();
1848  ignoredBodies.Add(AnimController.Collider.FarseerBody);
1849 
1850  var body = Submarine.PickBody(
1851  SimPosition,
1852  attackPos,
1853  ignoredBodies,
1854  Physics.CollisionCharacter | Physics.CollisionWall);
1855 
1856  IDamageable attackTarget = null;
1857  if (body != null)
1858  {
1859  attackPos = Submarine.LastPickedPosition;
1860 
1861  if (body.UserData is Submarine sub)
1862  {
1863  body = Submarine.PickBody(
1864  SimPosition - ((Submarine)body.UserData).SimPosition,
1865  attackPos - ((Submarine)body.UserData).SimPosition,
1866  ignoredBodies,
1867  Physics.CollisionWall);
1868 
1869  if (body != null)
1870  {
1871  attackPos = Submarine.LastPickedPosition + sub.SimPosition;
1872  attackTarget = body.UserData as IDamageable;
1873  }
1874  }
1875  else
1876  {
1877  if (body.UserData is IDamageable damageable)
1878  {
1879  attackTarget = damageable;
1880  }
1881  else if (body.UserData is Limb limb)
1882  {
1883  attackTarget = limb.character;
1884  }
1885  }
1886  }
1887  var currentContexts = GetAttackContexts();
1888  var validLimbs = AnimController.Limbs.Where(l =>
1889  {
1890  if (l.IsSevered || l.IsStuck) { return false; }
1891  if (l.Disabled) { return false; }
1892  var attack = l.attack;
1893  if (attack == null) { return false; }
1894  if (attack.CoolDownTimer > 0) { return false; }
1895  if (!attack.IsValidContext(currentContexts)) { return false; }
1896  if (attackTarget != null)
1897  {
1898  if (!attack.IsValidTarget(attackTarget as Entity)) { return false; }
1899  if (attackTarget is ISerializableEntity se && attackTarget is Character)
1900  {
1901  if (attack.Conditionals.Any(c => !c.TargetSelf && !c.Matches(se))) { return false; }
1902  }
1903  }
1904  if (attack.Conditionals.Any(c => c.TargetSelf && !c.Matches(this))) { return false; }
1905  return true;
1906  });
1907  var sortedLimbs = validLimbs.OrderBy(l => Vector2.DistanceSquared(ConvertUnits.ToDisplayUnits(l.SimPosition), cursorPosition));
1908  // Select closest
1909  var attackLimb = sortedLimbs.FirstOrDefault();
1910  if (attackLimb != null)
1911  {
1912  if (attackTarget is Character targetCharacter)
1913  {
1914  dist = ConvertUnits.ToDisplayUnits(Vector2.Distance(Submarine.LastPickedPosition, attackLimb.SimPosition));
1915  foreach (Limb limb in targetCharacter.AnimController.Limbs)
1916  {
1917  if (limb.IsSevered || limb.Removed) { continue; }
1918  float tempDist = ConvertUnits.ToDisplayUnits(Vector2.Distance(limb.SimPosition, attackLimb.SimPosition));
1919  if (tempDist < dist)
1920  {
1921  dist = tempDist;
1922  }
1923  }
1924  }
1925  attackLimb.UpdateAttack(deltaTime, attackPos, attackTarget, out AttackResult attackResult, dist);
1926  if (!attackLimb.attack.IsRunning)
1927  {
1928  attackCoolDown = 1.0f;
1929  }
1930  }
1931  }
1932  }
1933 
1934  if (SelectedConstruction == null || !SelectedConstruction.Prefab.DisableItemUsageWhenSelected)
1935  {
1936  foreach (Item item in HeldItems)
1937  {
1938  if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Aim) || !item.RequireAimToSecondaryUse)
1939  {
1940  item.SecondaryUse(deltaTime, this);
1941  }
1942  if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Use) && !item.IsShootable)
1943  {
1944  if (!item.RequireAimToUse || IsKeyDown(InputType.Aim))
1945  {
1946  item.Use(deltaTime, this);
1947  }
1948  }
1949  if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Shoot) && item.IsShootable)
1950  {
1951  if (!item.RequireAimToUse || IsKeyDown(InputType.Aim))
1952  {
1953  item.Use(deltaTime, this);
1954  }
1955 #if CLIENT
1956  else if (item.RequireAimToUse && !IsKeyDown(InputType.Aim))
1957  {
1958  HintManager.OnShootWithoutAiming(this, item);
1959  }
1960 #endif
1961  }
1962  }
1963  }
1964 
1965  if (SelectedConstruction != null)
1966  {
1967  if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Aim) || !SelectedConstruction.RequireAimToSecondaryUse)
1968  {
1969  SelectedConstruction.SecondaryUse(deltaTime, this);
1970  }
1971  if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Use) && SelectedConstruction != null && !SelectedConstruction.IsShootable)
1972  {
1973  if (!SelectedConstruction.RequireAimToUse || IsKeyDown(InputType.Aim))
1974  {
1975  SelectedConstruction.Use(deltaTime, this);
1976  }
1977  }
1978  if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Shoot) && SelectedConstruction != null && SelectedConstruction.IsShootable)
1979  {
1980  if (!SelectedConstruction.RequireAimToUse || IsKeyDown(InputType.Aim))
1981  {
1982  SelectedConstruction.Use(deltaTime, this);
1983  }
1984  }
1985  }
1986 
1987  if (SelectedCharacter != null)
1988  {
1989  if (Vector2.DistanceSquared(SelectedCharacter.WorldPosition, WorldPosition) > 90000.0f || !SelectedCharacter.CanBeSelected)
1990  {
1991  DeselectCharacter();
1992  }
1993  }
1994 
1995  if (IsRemotelyControlled && keys != null)
1996  {
1997  foreach (Key key in keys)
1998  {
1999  key.ResetHit();
2000  }
2001  }
2002  }

2021 
2022  public bool CanSeeCharacter(Character target)
2023  {
2024  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(target != null);
2025  if (target == null) { return false; }
2026  if (target.Removed) { return false; }
2027  Limb seeingLimb = GetSeeingLimb();
2028  if (CanSeeTarget(target, seeingLimb)) { return true; }
2029  if (!target.AnimController.SimplePhysicsEnabled)
2030  {
2031  //find the limbs that are furthest from the target's position (from the viewer's point of view)
2032  Limb leftExtremity = null, rightExtremity = null;
2033  float leftMostDot = 0.0f, rightMostDot = 0.0f;
2034  Vector2 dir = target.WorldPosition - WorldPosition;
2035  Vector2 leftDir = new Vector2(dir.Y, -dir.X);
2036  Vector2 rightDir = new Vector2(-dir.Y, dir.X);
2037  foreach (Limb limb in target.AnimController.Limbs)
2038  {
2039  if (limb.IsSevered || limb == target.AnimController.MainLimb) { continue; }
2040  if (limb.Hidden) { continue; }
2041  Vector2 limbDir = limb.WorldPosition - WorldPosition;
2042  float leftDot = Vector2.Dot(limbDir, leftDir);
2043  if (leftDot > leftMostDot)
2044  {
2045  leftMostDot = leftDot;
2046  leftExtremity = limb;
2047  continue;
2048  }
2049  float rightDot = Vector2.Dot(limbDir, rightDir);
2050  if (rightDot > rightMostDot)
2051  {
2052  rightMostDot = rightDot;
2053  rightExtremity = limb;
2054  continue;
2055  }
2056  }
2057  if (leftExtremity != null && CanSeeTarget(leftExtremity, seeingLimb)) { return true; }
2058  if (rightExtremity != null && CanSeeTarget(rightExtremity, seeingLimb)) { return true; }
2059  }
2060  return false;
2061  }
2062 
2063  private Limb GetSeeingLimb()
2064  {
2065  return AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.Head) ?? AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.Torso) ?? AnimController.MainLimb;
2066  }
2067 
2068  public bool CanSeeTarget(ISpatialEntity target, ISpatialEntity seeingEntity = null)
2069  {
2070  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(target != null);
2071  if (target == null) { return false; }
2072  seeingEntity ??= AnimController.SimplePhysicsEnabled ? this : GetSeeingLimb() as ISpatialEntity;
2073  if (seeingEntity == null) { return false; }
2074  ISpatialEntity sourceEntity = seeingEntity ;
2075  // TODO: Could we just use the method below? If not, let's refactor it so that we can.
2076  Vector2 diff = ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(target.WorldPosition - sourceEntity.WorldPosition);
2077  Body closestBody;
2078  //both inside the same sub (or both outside)
2079  //OR the we're inside, the other character outside
2080  if (target.Submarine == Submarine || target.Submarine == null)
2081  {
2082  closestBody = Submarine.CheckVisibility(sourceEntity.SimPosition, sourceEntity.SimPosition + diff);
2083  }
2084  //we're outside, the other character inside
2085  else if (Submarine == null)
2086  {
2087  closestBody = Submarine.CheckVisibility(target.SimPosition, target.SimPosition - diff);
2088  }
2089  //both inside different subs
2090  else
2091  {
2092  closestBody = Submarine.CheckVisibility(sourceEntity.SimPosition, sourceEntity.SimPosition + diff);
2093  if (!IsBlocking(closestBody))
2094  {
2095  closestBody = Submarine.CheckVisibility(target.SimPosition, target.SimPosition - diff);
2096  }
2097  }
2098  return !IsBlocking(closestBody);
2099 
2100  bool IsBlocking(Body body)
2101  {
2102  if (body == null) { return false; }
2103  if (body.UserData is Structure wall && wall.CastShadow)
2104  {
2105  return wall != target;
2106  }
2107  else if (body.UserData is Item item)
2108  {
2109  return item != target;
2110  }
2111  return true;
2112  }
2113  }

2118  public bool IsFacing(Vector2 targetWorldPos) => AnimController.Dir > 0 && targetWorldPos.X > WorldPosition.X || AnimController.Dir < 0 && targetWorldPos.X < WorldPosition.X;
2119 
2120  public bool HasItem(Item item, bool requireEquipped = false, InvSlotType? slotType = null) => requireEquipped ? HasEquippedItem(item, slotType) : item.IsOwnedBy(this);
2121 
2122  public bool HasEquippedItem(Item item, InvSlotType? slotType = null, Func<InvSlotType, bool> predicate = null)
2123  {
2124  if (Inventory == null) { return false; }
2125  for (int i = 0; i < Inventory.Capacity; i++)
2126  {
2127  InvSlotType slot = Inventory.SlotTypes[i];
2128  if (predicate != null)
2129  {
2130  if (!predicate(slot)) { continue; }
2131  }
2132  if (slotType.HasValue)
2133  {
2134  if (!slotType.Value.HasFlag(slot)) { continue; }
2135  }
2136  else if (slot == InvSlotType.Any)
2137  {
2138  continue;
2139  }
2140  if (Inventory.GetItemAt(i) == item) { return true; }
2141  }
2142  return false;
2143  }

2148  public bool HasEquippedItem(Identifier tagOrIdentifier, bool allowBroken = true, InvSlotType? slotType = null)
2149  {
2150  if (Inventory == null) { return false; }
2151  for (int i = 0; i < Inventory.Capacity; i++)
2152  {
2153  if (slotType.HasValue)
2154  {
2155  if (!slotType.Value.HasFlag(Inventory.SlotTypes[i])) { continue; }
2156  }
2157  else if (Inventory.SlotTypes[i] == InvSlotType.Any)
2158  {
2159  continue;
2160  }
2161  var item = Inventory.GetItemAt(i);
2162  if (item == null) { continue; }
2163  if (!allowBroken && item.Condition <= 0.0f) { continue; }
2164  if (item.Prefab.Identifier == tagOrIdentifier || item.HasTag(tagOrIdentifier)) { return true; }
2165  }
2166  return false;
2167  }

2173  {

2189  public bool CanAccessInventory(Inventory inventory)
2190  {
2191  if (!CanInteract || inventory.Locked) { return false; }
2192 
2193  //the inventory belongs to some other character
2194  if (inventory.Owner is Character character && inventory.Owner != this)
2195  {
2196  var owner = character;
2197  //can only be accessed if the character is incapacitated and has been selected
2198  return SelectedCharacter == owner && owner.CanInventoryBeAccessed;
2199  }
2200 
2201  if (inventory.Owner is Item item)
2202  {
2203  if (!CanInteractWith(item) && !item.linkedTo.Any(lt => lt is Item item && item.DisplaySideBySideWhenLinked && CanInteractWith(item))) { return false; }
2204  ItemContainer container = item.GetComponents<ItemContainer>().FirstOrDefault(ic => ic.Inventory == inventory);
2205  if (container != null && !container.HasRequiredItems(this, addMessage: false)) { return false; }
2206  }
2207  return true;
2208  }

2210  private float _selectedItemPriority;
2211  private Item _foundItem;
2219  public bool FindItem(ref int itemIndex, out Item targetItem, IEnumerable<Identifier> identifiers = null, bool ignoreBroken = true,
2220  IEnumerable<Item> ignoredItems = null, IEnumerable<Identifier> ignoredContainerIdentifiers = null,
2221  Func<Item, bool> customPredicate = null, Func<Item, float> customPriorityFunction = null, float maxItemDistance = 10000, ISpatialEntity positionalReference = null)
2222  {
2223  if (itemIndex == 0)
2224  {
2225  _foundItem = null;
2226  _selectedItemPriority = 0;
2227  }
2228  for (int i = 0; i < 10 && itemIndex < Item.ItemList.Count - 1; i++)
2229  {
2230  itemIndex++;
2231  var item = Item.ItemList[itemIndex];
2232  if (!item.IsInteractable(this)) { continue; }
2233  if (ignoredItems != null && ignoredItems.Contains(item)) { continue; }
2234  if (item.Submarine == null) { continue; }
2235  if (item.Submarine.TeamID != TeamID) { continue; }
2236  if (item.CurrentHull == null) { continue; }
2237  if (ignoreBroken && item.Condition <= 0) { continue; }
2238  if (Submarine != null)
2239  {
2240  if (!Submarine.IsEntityFoundOnThisSub(item, true)) { continue; }
2241  }
2242  if (customPredicate != null && !customPredicate(item)) { continue; }
2243  if (identifiers != null && identifiers.None(id => item.Prefab.Identifier == id || item.HasTag(id))) { continue; }
2244  if (ignoredContainerIdentifiers != null && item.Container != null)
2245  {
2246  if (ignoredContainerIdentifiers.Contains(item.ContainerIdentifier)) { continue; }
2247  }
2248  if (IsItemTakenBySomeoneElse(item)) { continue; }
2249  Entity rootInventoryOwner = item.GetRootInventoryOwner();
2250  if (rootInventoryOwner is Item ownerItem)
2251  {
2252  if (!ownerItem.IsInteractable(this)) { continue; }
2253  }
2254  float itemPriority = customPriorityFunction != null ? customPriorityFunction(item) : 1;
2255  if (itemPriority <= 0) { continue; }
2256  Vector2 itemPos = (rootInventoryOwner ?? item).WorldPosition;
2257  Vector2 refPos = positionalReference != null ? positionalReference.WorldPosition : WorldPosition;
2258  float yDist = Math.Abs(refPos.Y - itemPos.Y);
2259  yDist = yDist > 100 ? yDist * 5 : 0;
2260  float dist = Math.Abs(refPos.X - itemPos.X) + yDist;
2261  float distanceFactor = MathHelper.Lerp(1, 0, MathUtils.InverseLerp(0, maxItemDistance, dist));
2262  itemPriority *= distanceFactor;
2263  if (itemPriority > _selectedItemPriority)
2264  {
2265  _selectedItemPriority = itemPriority;
2266  _foundItem = item;
2267  }
2268  }
2269  targetItem = _foundItem;
2270  return itemIndex >= Item.ItemList.Count - 1;
2271  }

2273  public bool IsItemTakenBySomeoneElse(Item item) => item.FindParentInventory(i => i.Owner != this && i.Owner is Character owner && !owner.IsDead && !owner.Removed) != null;

2275  public bool CanInteractWith(Character c, float maxDist = 200.0f, bool checkVisibility = true, bool skipDistanceCheck = false)
2276  {
2277  if (c == this || Removed || !c.Enabled || !c.CanBeSelected || c.InvisibleTimer > 0.0f) { return false; }
2278  if (!c.CharacterHealth.UseHealthWindow && !c.CanBeDragged && (c.onCustomInteract == null || !c.AllowCustomInteract)) { return false; }
2279 
2280  if (!skipDistanceCheck)
2281  {
2282  maxDist = ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(maxDist);
2283  if (Vector2.DistanceSquared(SimPosition, c.SimPosition) > maxDist * maxDist) { return false; }
2284  }
2285 
2286  return checkVisibility ? CanSeeCharacter(c) : true;
2287  }

2293 
2294  public bool CanInteractWith(Item item, out float distanceToItem, bool checkLinked)
2295  {
2296  distanceToItem = -1.0f;
2297 
2298  bool hidden = item.HiddenInGame;
2299 #if CLIENT
2300  if (Screen.Selected == GameMain.SubEditorScreen) { hidden = false; }
2301 #endif
2302  if (!CanInteract || hidden || !item.IsInteractable(this)) { return false; }
2303 
2304  if (item.ParentInventory != null)
2305  {
2306  return CanAccessInventory(item.ParentInventory);
2307  }
2308 
2309  Wire wire = item.GetComponent<Wire>();
2310  if (wire != null && item.GetComponent<ConnectionPanel>() == null)
2311  {
2312  //locked wires are never interactable
2313  if (wire.Locked) { return false; }
2314  if (wire.HiddenInGame && Screen.Selected == GameMain.GameScreen) { return false; }
2315 
2316  //wires are interactable if the character has selected an item the wire is connected to,
2317  //and it's disconnected from the other end
2318  if (wire.Connections[0]?.Item != null && SelectedConstruction == wire.Connections[0].Item)
2319  {
2320  return wire.Connections[1] == null;
2321  }
2322  if (wire.Connections[1]?.Item != null && SelectedConstruction == wire.Connections[1].Item)
2323  {
2324  return wire.Connections[0] == null;
2325  }
2326  if (SelectedConstruction?.GetComponent<ConnectionPanel>()?.DisconnectedWires.Contains(wire) ?? false)
2327  {
2328  return wire.Connections[0] == null && wire.Connections[1] == null;
2329  }
2330  }
2331 
2332  if (checkLinked && item.DisplaySideBySideWhenLinked)
2333  {
2334  foreach (MapEntity linked in item.linkedTo)
2335  {
2336  if (linked is Item linkedItem)
2337  {
2338  if (CanInteractWith(linkedItem, out float distToLinked, checkLinked: false))
2339  {
2340  distanceToItem = distToLinked;
2341  return true;
2342  }
2343  }
2344  }
2345  }
2346 
2347  if (item.InteractDistance == 0.0f && !item.Prefab.Triggers.Any()) { return false; }
2348 
2349  Pickable pickableComponent = item.GetComponent<Pickable>();
2350  if (pickableComponent != null && pickableComponent.Picker != this && pickableComponent.Picker != null && !pickableComponent.Picker.IsDead) { return false; }
2351 
2352  if (SelectedConstruction?.GetComponent<RemoteController>()?.TargetItem == item) { return true; }
2353  //optimization: don't use HeldItems because it allocates memory and this method is executed very frequently
2354  var heldItem1 = Inventory?.GetItemInLimbSlot(InvSlotType.RightHand);
2355  if (heldItem1?.GetComponent<RemoteController>()?.TargetItem == item) { return true; }
2356  var heldItem2 = Inventory?.GetItemInLimbSlot(InvSlotType.LeftHand);
2357  if (heldItem2?.GetComponent<RemoteController>()?.TargetItem == item) { return true; }
2358 
2359  Vector2 characterDirection = Vector2.Transform(Vector2.UnitY, Matrix.CreateRotationZ(AnimController.Collider.Rotation));
2360 
2361  Vector2 upperBodyPosition = Position + (characterDirection * 20.0f);
2362  Vector2 lowerBodyPosition = Position - (characterDirection * 60.0f);
2363 
2364  if (Submarine != null)
2365  {
2366  upperBodyPosition += Submarine.Position;
2367  lowerBodyPosition += Submarine.Position;
2368  }
2369 
2370  bool insideTrigger = item.IsInsideTrigger(upperBodyPosition) || item.IsInsideTrigger(lowerBodyPosition);
2371  if (item.Prefab.Triggers.Length > 0 && !insideTrigger && item.Prefab.RequireBodyInsideTrigger) { return false; }
2372 
2373  Rectangle itemDisplayRect = new Rectangle(item.InteractionRect.X, item.InteractionRect.Y - item.InteractionRect.Height, item.InteractionRect.Width, item.InteractionRect.Height);
2374 
2375  // Get the point along the line between lowerBodyPosition and upperBodyPosition which is closest to the center of itemDisplayRect
2376  Vector2 playerDistanceCheckPosition =
2377  lowerBodyPosition.Y < upperBodyPosition.Y ?
2378  Vector2.Clamp(itemDisplayRect.Center.ToVector2(), lowerBodyPosition, upperBodyPosition) :
2379  Vector2.Clamp(itemDisplayRect.Center.ToVector2(), upperBodyPosition, lowerBodyPosition);
2380 
2381  // If playerDistanceCheckPosition is inside the itemDisplayRect then we consider the character to within 0 distance of the item
2382  if (itemDisplayRect.Contains(playerDistanceCheckPosition))
2383  {
2384  distanceToItem = 0.0f;
2385  }
2386  else
2387  {
2388  // Here we get the point on the itemDisplayRect which is closest to playerDistanceCheckPosition
2389  Vector2 rectIntersectionPoint = new Vector2(
2390  MathHelper.Clamp(playerDistanceCheckPosition.X, itemDisplayRect.X, itemDisplayRect.Right),
2391  MathHelper.Clamp(playerDistanceCheckPosition.Y, itemDisplayRect.Y, itemDisplayRect.Bottom));
2392  distanceToItem = Vector2.Distance(rectIntersectionPoint, playerDistanceCheckPosition);
2393  }
2394 
2395  if (distanceToItem > item.InteractDistance && item.InteractDistance > 0.0f) { return false; }
2396 
2397  if (!item.Prefab.InteractThroughWalls && Screen.Selected != GameMain.SubEditorScreen && !insideTrigger)
2398  {
2399  Vector2 itemPosition = item.SimPosition;
2400  if (Submarine == null && item.Submarine != null)
2401  {
2402  //character is outside, item inside
2403  itemPosition += item.Submarine.SimPosition;
2404  }
2405  else if (Submarine != null && item.Submarine == null)
2406  {
2407  //character is inside, item outside
2408  itemPosition -= Submarine.SimPosition;
2409  }
2410  else if (Submarine != item.Submarine)
2411  {
2412  //character and the item are inside different subs
2413  itemPosition += item.Submarine.SimPosition;
2414  itemPosition -= Submarine.SimPosition;
2415  }
2416  var body = Submarine.CheckVisibility(SimPosition, itemPosition, ignoreLevel: true);
2417  if (body != null && body.UserData as Item != item && (body.UserData as ItemComponent)?.Item != item && Submarine.LastPickedFixture?.UserData as Item != item)
2418  {
2419  return false;
2420  }
2421  }
2422 
2423  return true;
2424  }

2471  public void DoInteractionUpdate(float deltaTime, Vector2 mouseSimPos)
2472  {
2473  bool isLocalPlayer = Controlled == this;
2474 
2475  if (!isLocalPlayer && (this is AICharacter && !IsRemotePlayer))
2476  {
2477  return;
2478  }
2479 
2480  if (ResetInteract)
2481  {
2482  ResetInteract = false;
2483  return;
2484  }

2486  if (!CanInteract)
2487  {
2488  SelectedConstruction = null;
2489  focusedItem = null;
2490  if (!AllowInput)
2491  {
2492  FocusedCharacter = null;
2493  if (SelectedCharacter != null) DeselectCharacter();
2494  return;
2495  }
2496  }
2497 
2498 #if CLIENT
2499  if (isLocalPlayer)
2500  {
2501  if (!IsMouseOnUI && (ViewTarget == null || ViewTarget == this))
2502  {

2504  {

2506  if (FocusedCharacter != null && !CanSeeCharacter(FocusedCharacter)) { FocusedCharacter = null; }

2511  aimAssist = 0.0f;
2512  }

2515

2517  if (focusedItem != null && focusedItem.CampaignInteractionType != CampaignMode.InteractionType.None)
2518  {
2519  FocusedCharacter = null;
2520  }
2521  findFocusedTimer = 0.05f;
2522  }
2523  }
2524  else
2525  {
2526  FocusedCharacter = null;
2527  focusedItem = null;
2528  }

2530  }
2531 #endif
2532  var head = AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.Head);
2533  bool headInWater = head == null ?
2534  AnimController.InWater :
2535  head.InWater;
2536  //climb ladders automatically when pressing up/down inside their trigger area
2537  Ladder currentLadder = SelectedConstruction?.GetComponent<Ladder>();
2538  if ((SelectedConstruction == null || currentLadder != null) &&
2539  !headInWater && Screen.Selected != GameMain.SubEditorScreen)
2540  {

2542  bool isControlled = Controlled == this;
2543 
2544  Ladder nearbyLadder = null;
2545  if (isControlled || climbInput)
2546  {
2547  float minDist = float.PositiveInfinity;
2548  foreach (Ladder ladder in Ladder.List)
2549  {
2550  if (ladder == currentLadder)
2551  {
2552  continue;
2553  }
2554  else if (currentLadder != null)
2555  {
2556  //only switch from ladder to another if the ladders are above the current ladders and pressing up, or vice versa
2557  if (ladder.Item.WorldPosition.Y > currentLadder.Item.WorldPosition.Y != IsKeyDown(InputType.Up))
2558  {
2559  continue;
2560  }
2561  }
2562

2564  {
2565  minDist = dist;
2566  nearbyLadder = ladder;
2567  if (isControlled)
2568  {
2569  ladder.Item.IsHighlighted = true;
2570  }
2571  break;
2572  }
2573  }
2574  }

2577  {
2578  if (nearbyLadder.Select(this))
2579  {
2580  SelectedConstruction = nearbyLadder.Item;
2581  }
2582  }

2598  {
2599  if (FocusedCharacter == SelectedCharacter)
2600  {
2601  DeselectCharacter();
2602 #if CLIENT

2604  {
2605  CharacterHealth.OpenHealthWindow = null;

2616  }

2618  }

2621  {
2622  FocusedCharacter.onCustomInteract(FocusedCharacter, this);

2627 #if CLIENT

2629 #endif
2630  }

2632  {

2634  }

2641 #if CLIENT

2664  public static void UpdateAll(float deltaTime, Camera cam)
2665  {
2666  if (GameMain.NetworkMember == null || !GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient)
2667  {
2668  foreach (Character c in CharacterList)
2669  {
2670  if (!(c is AICharacter) && !c.IsRemotePlayer) continue;
2671 
2672  if (c.IsPlayer || (c.IsBot && !c.IsDead))
2673  {
2674  c.Enabled = true;
2675  }
2676  else if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsServer)
2677  {
2678  //disable AI characters that are far away from all clients and the host's character and not controlled by anyone
2679  float closestPlayerDist = c.GetDistanceToClosestPlayer();
2680  if (closestPlayerDist > c.Params.DisableDistance)
2681  {
2682  c.Enabled = false;
2683  if (c.IsDead && c.AIController is EnemyAIController)
2684  {
2685  Spawner?.AddEntityToRemoveQueue(c);
2686  }
2687  }
2688  else if (closestPlayerDist < c.Params.DisableDistance * 0.9f)
2689  {
2690  c.Enabled = true;
2691  }
2692  }
2693  else if (Submarine.MainSub != null)
2694  {
2695  //disable AI characters that are far away from the sub and the controlled character
2696  float distSqr = Vector2.DistanceSquared(Submarine.MainSub.WorldPosition, c.WorldPosition);
2697  if (Controlled != null)
2698  {
2699  distSqr = Math.Min(distSqr, Vector2.DistanceSquared(Controlled.WorldPosition, c.WorldPosition));
2700  }
2701  else
2702  {
2703  distSqr = Math.Min(distSqr, Vector2.DistanceSquared(GameMain.GameScreen.Cam.GetPosition(), c.WorldPosition));
2704  }
2705 
2706  if (distSqr > MathUtils.Pow2(c.Params.DisableDistance))
2707  {
2708  c.Enabled = false;
2709  if (c.IsDead && c.AIController is EnemyAIController)
2710  {
2711  Entity.Spawner?.AddEntityToRemoveQueue(c);
2712  }
2713  }
2714  else if (distSqr < MathUtils.Pow2(c.Params.DisableDistance * 0.9f))
2715  {
2716  c.Enabled = true;
2717  }
2718  }
2719  }
2720  }
2721 
2722  characterUpdateTick++;
2723 
2724  if (characterUpdateTick % CharacterUpdateInterval == 0)
2725  {
2726  for (int i = 0; i < CharacterList.Count; i++)
2727  {
2728  if (GameMain.LuaCs.Game.updatePriorityCharacters.Contains(CharacterList[i])) continue;
2729 
2730  CharacterList[i].Update(deltaTime * CharacterUpdateInterval, cam);
2731  }
2732  }
2733 
2734  foreach (Character character in GameMain.LuaCs.Game.updatePriorityCharacters)
2735  {
2736  if (character.Removed) continue;
2737 
2738  character.Update(deltaTime, cam);
2739  }
2740  }

2742  public virtual void Update(float deltaTime, Camera cam)
2743  {
2744  UpdateProjSpecific(deltaTime, cam);
2745 
2746  KnockbackCooldownTimer -= deltaTime;
2747 
2748  if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient && this == Controlled && !isSynced) { return; }
2749 
2750  UpdateDespawn(deltaTime);
2751 
2752  if (!Enabled) { return; }
2753 
2754  if (Level.Loaded != null)

2970  public void AddAttacker(Character character, float damage)
2971  {
2972  Attacker attacker = lastAttackers.FirstOrDefault(a => a.Character == character);
2973  if (attacker != null)
2974  {
2975  lastAttackers.Remove(attacker);
2976  }
2977  else
2978  {
2979  attacker = new Attacker { Character = character };
2980  }
2981 
2982  if (lastAttackers.Count > maxLastAttackerCount)
2983  {
2984  lastAttackers.RemoveRange(0, lastAttackers.Count - maxLastAttackerCount);
2985  }
2986 
2987  attacker.Damage += damage;
2988  lastAttackers.Add(attacker);
2989  }

3012  private void UpdateAttackers(float deltaTime)
3013  {
3014  //slowly forget about damage done by attackers
3015  foreach (Attacker enemy in LastAttackers)
3016  {
3017  float cumulativeDamage = enemy.Damage;
3018  if (cumulativeDamage > 0)
3019  {
3020  float reduction = deltaTime;
3021  if (cumulativeDamage < 2)
3022  {
3023  // If the damage is very low, let's not forget so quickly, or we can't cumulate the damage from repair tools (high frequency, low damage)
3024  reduction *= 0.5f;
3025  }
3026  enemy.Damage = Math.Max(0.0f, enemy.Damage - reduction);
3027  }
3028  }
3029  }

3031  private void UpdateOxygen(float deltaTime)
3032  {
3033  if (NeedsAir)
3034  {
3035  if (Timing.TotalTime > pressureProtectionLastSet + 0.1)
3036  {
3037  pressureProtection = 0.0f;
3038  }
3039  }

3044  {
3045  waterAvailable = CurrentHull.WaterPercentage;
3046  }
3047  OxygenAvailable += MathHelper.Clamp(waterAvailable - oxygenAvailable, -deltaTime * 50.0f, deltaTime * 50.0f);
3048  }
3049  else
3050  {

3052  if (!AnimController.HeadInWater && AnimController.CurrentHull != null)
3053  {
3054  //don't decrease the amount of oxygen in the hull if the character has more oxygen available than the hull
3055  //(i.e. if the character has some external source of oxygen)
3056  if (OxygenAvailable * 0.98f < AnimController.CurrentHull.OxygenPercentage && UseHullOxygen)
3057  {
3058  AnimController.CurrentHull.Oxygen -= Hull.OxygenConsumptionSpeed * deltaTime;
3059  }
3060  hullAvailableOxygen = AnimController.CurrentHull.OxygenPercentage;
3061 
3062  }
3063  OxygenAvailable += MathHelper.Clamp(hullAvailableOxygen - oxygenAvailable, -deltaTime * 50.0f, deltaTime * 50.0f);
3064  }
3065  UseHullOxygen = true;
3066  }

3071  protected float GetDistanceToClosestPlayer()
3072  {
3073  return (float)Math.Sqrt(GetDistanceSqrToClosestPlayer());
3074  }
3075 
3079  protected float GetDistanceSqrToClosestPlayer()
3080  {
3081  float distSqr = float.MaxValue;
3082  foreach (Character otherCharacter in CharacterList)
3083  {
3084  if (otherCharacter == this || !otherCharacter.IsRemotePlayer) { continue; }
3085  distSqr = Math.Min(distSqr, Vector2.DistanceSquared(otherCharacter.WorldPosition, WorldPosition));
3086  if (otherCharacter.ViewTarget != null)
3087  {
3088  distSqr = Math.Min(distSqr, Vector2.DistanceSquared(otherCharacter.ViewTarget.WorldPosition, WorldPosition));
3089  }
3090  }
3091 #if SERVER
3092  for (int i = 0; i < GameMain.Server.ConnectedClients.Count; i++)
3093  {
3094  var spectatePos = GameMain.Server.ConnectedClients[i].SpectatePos;
3095  if (spectatePos != null)
3096  {
3097  distSqr = Math.Min(distSqr, Vector2.DistanceSquared(spectatePos.Value, WorldPosition));
3098  }
3099  }
3100 #else
3101  if (this == Controlled) { return 0.0f; }
3102  if (controlled != null)
3103  {
3104  distSqr = Math.Min(distSqr, Vector2.DistanceSquared(Controlled.WorldPosition, WorldPosition));
3105  }
3106  distSqr = Math.Min(distSqr, Vector2.DistanceSquared(GameMain.GameScreen.Cam.Position, WorldPosition));
3107 #endif
3108  return distSqr;
3109  }

3111  private float despawnTimer;
3112  private void UpdateDespawn(float deltaTime, bool ignoreThresholds = false, bool createNetworkEvents = true)
3113  {
3114  if (!EnableDespawn) { return; }
3115 
3116  //clients don't despawn characters unless the server says so
3117  if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && !GameMain.NetworkMember.IsServer) { return; }
3118 
3119  if (!IsDead || (CauseOfDeath?.Type == CauseOfDeathType.Disconnected && GameMain.GameSession?.Campaign != null)) { return; }
3120 
3121  int subCorpseCount = 0;
3122 
3123  if (Submarine != null && !ignoreThresholds)
3124  {
3125  subCorpseCount = CharacterList.Count(c => c.IsDead && c.Submarine == Submarine);
3126  if (subCorpseCount < GameSettings.CurrentConfig.CorpsesPerSubDespawnThreshold) { return; }
3127  }
3128 
3129  if (SelectedBy != null)
3130  {
3131  despawnTimer = 0.0f;
3132  return;
3133  }
3134 
3135  float distToClosestPlayer = GetDistanceToClosestPlayer();
3136  if (distToClosestPlayer > Params.DisableDistance)
3137  {
3138  //despawn in 1 minute if very far from all human players
3139  despawnTimer = Math.Max(despawnTimer, GameSettings.CurrentConfig.CorpseDespawnDelay - 60.0f);
3140  }
3141 
3142  float despawnPriority = 1.0f;
3143  if (subCorpseCount > GameSettings.CurrentConfig.CorpsesPerSubDespawnThreshold)
3144  {
3145  //despawn faster if there are lots of corpses in the sub (twice as many as the threshold -> despawn twice as fast)
3146  despawnPriority += (subCorpseCount - GameSettings.CurrentConfig.CorpsesPerSubDespawnThreshold) / (float)GameSettings.CurrentConfig.CorpsesPerSubDespawnThreshold;
3147  }
3148  if (AIController is EnemyAIController)
3149  {
3150  //enemies despawn faster
3151  despawnPriority *= 2.0f;
3152  }
3153 
3154  despawnTimer += deltaTime * despawnPriority;
3155  if (despawnTimer < GameSettings.CurrentConfig.CorpseDespawnDelay) { return; }
3156 
3157  if (IsHuman)
3158  {
3159  var containerPrefab =
3160  ItemPrefab.Prefabs.Find(me => me.Tags.Contains("despawncontainer")) ??
3161  (MapEntityPrefab.FindByIdentifier("metalcrate".ToIdentifier()) as ItemPrefab);
3162  if (containerPrefab == null)
3163  {
3164  DebugConsole.NewMessage("Could not spawn a container for a despawned character's items. No item with the tag \"despawncontainer\" or the identifier \"metalcrate\" found.", Color.Red);
3165  }
3166  else
3167  {
3168  Spawner?.AddItemToSpawnQueue(containerPrefab, WorldPosition, onSpawned: onItemContainerSpawned);
3169  }
3170 
3171  void onItemContainerSpawned(Item item)
3172  {
3173  if (Inventory == null) { return; }
3174 
3175  item.UpdateTransform();
3176  item.AddTag("name:" + Name);
3177  if (info?.Job != null) { item.AddTag($"job:{info.Job.Name}"); }
3178 
3179  var itemContainer = item?.GetComponent<ItemContainer>();
3180  if (itemContainer == null) { return; }
3181  List<Item> inventoryItems = new List<Item>(Inventory.AllItemsMod);
3182  foreach (Item inventoryItem in inventoryItems)
3183  {
3184  if (!itemContainer.Inventory.TryPutItem(inventoryItem, user: null, createNetworkEvent: createNetworkEvents))
3185  {
3186  //if the item couldn't be put inside the despawn container, just drop it
3187  inventoryItem.Drop(dropper: this, createNetworkEvent: createNetworkEvents);
3188  }
3189  }
3190  //this needs to happen after the items have been dropped (we can no longer sync dropping the items if the character has been removed)
3191  Spawner.AddEntityToRemoveQueue(this);
3192  }
3193  }
3194  else
3195  {
3196  Spawner.AddEntityToRemoveQueue(this);
3197  }
3198  }

3227  private void UpdateSightRange(float deltaTime)
3228  {
3229  if (aiTarget == null) { return; }
3230  float minRange = Math.Clamp((float)Math.Sqrt(Mass) * Visibility, 250, 1000);
3231  float massFactor = (float)Math.Sqrt(Mass / 20);
3232  float targetRange = Math.Min(minRange + massFactor * AnimController.Collider.LinearVelocity.Length() * 2 * Visibility, maxAIRange);
3233  float newRange = MathHelper.SmoothStep(aiTarget.SightRange, targetRange, deltaTime * aiTargetChangeSpeed);
3234  if (!float.IsNaN(newRange))
3235  {
3236  aiTarget.SightRange = newRange;
3237  }
3238  }

3250  float targetRange = Math.Min(massFactor * AnimController.Collider.LinearVelocity.Length() * 2 * Noise, maxAIRange);
3251  float newRange = MathHelper.SmoothStep(aiTarget.SoundRange, targetRange, deltaTime * aiTargetChangeSpeed);

3270  public void SetOrder(Order order, bool isNewOrder, bool speak = true, bool force = false)
3271  {
3272  var orderGiver = order?.OrderGiver;
3273  //set the character order only if the character is close enough to hear the message
3274  if (!force && orderGiver != null && !CanHearCharacter(orderGiver)) { return; }
3275 
3276  if (order != null)
3277  {
3278  if (order.AutoDismiss)
3279  {
3280  switch (order.Category)
3281  {
3282  case OrderCategory.Operate when order.TargetEntity != null:
3283  // If there's another character operating the same device, make them dismiss themself
3284  foreach (var character in CharacterList)
3285  {
3286  if (character == this) { continue; }
3287  if (character.TeamID != TeamID) { continue; }
3288  if (!(character.AIController is HumanAIController)) { continue; }
3289  if (!HumanAIController.IsActive(character)) { continue; }
3290  foreach (var currentOrder in character.CurrentOrders)
3291  {
3292  if (currentOrder == null) { continue; }
3293  if (currentOrder.Category != OrderCategory.Operate) { continue; }
3294  if (currentOrder.Identifier != order.Identifier) { continue; }
3295  if (currentOrder.TargetEntity != order.TargetEntity) { continue; }
3296  if (!currentOrder.AutoDismiss) { continue; }
3297  character.SetOrder(currentOrder.GetDismissal(), isNewOrder, speak: speak, force: force);
3298  break;
3299  }
3300  }
3301  break;
3302  case OrderCategory.Movement:
3303  // If there character has another movement order, dismiss that order
3304  Order orderToReplace = null;
3305  foreach (var currentOrder in CurrentOrders)
3306  {
3307  if (currentOrder == null) { continue; }
3308  if (currentOrder.Category != OrderCategory.Movement) { continue; }
3309  orderToReplace = currentOrder;
3310  break;
3311  }
3312  if (orderToReplace is { AutoDismiss: true })
3313  {
3314  SetOrder(orderToReplace.GetDismissal(), isNewOrder, speak: speak, force: force);
3315  }
3316  break;
3317  }
3318  }
3319  }
3320 
3321  // Prevent adding duplicate orders
3322  RemoveDuplicateOrders(order);
3323  AddCurrentOrder(order);
3324 
3325  if (orderGiver != null && order.Identifier != "dismissed" && isNewOrder)
3326  {
3327  var abilityOrderedCharacter = new AbilityOrderedCharacter(this);
3328  orderGiver.CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnGiveOrder, abilityOrderedCharacter);
3329 
3330  if (order.OrderGiver.LastOrderedCharacter != this)
3331  {
3332  order.OrderGiver.SecondLastOrderedCharacter = order.OrderGiver.LastOrderedCharacter;
3333  order.OrderGiver.LastOrderedCharacter = this;
3334  }
3335  }
3336 
3337  if (AIController is HumanAIController humanAI)
3338  {
3339  humanAI.SetOrder(order, speak);
3340  }
3341  SetOrderProjSpecific(order);
3342  }

3344  private void AddCurrentOrder(Order newOrder)
3345  {
3346  if (newOrder == null || newOrder.Identifier == "dismissed")
3347  {
3348  if (newOrder.Option != Identifier.Empty)
3349  {
3350  if (CurrentOrders.Any(o => o.MatchesDismissedOrder(newOrder.Option)))
3351  {
3352  var dismissedOrderInfo = CurrentOrders.First(o => o.MatchesDismissedOrder(newOrder.Option));
3353  int dismissedOrderPriority = dismissedOrderInfo.ManualPriority;
3354  CurrentOrders.Remove(dismissedOrderInfo);
3355  for (int i = 0; i < CurrentOrders.Count; i++)
3356  {
3357  var orderInfo = CurrentOrders[i];
3358  if (orderInfo.ManualPriority < dismissedOrderPriority)
3359  {
3360  CurrentOrders[i] = orderInfo.WithManualPriority(orderInfo.ManualPriority + 1);
3361  }
3362  }
3363  }
3364  }
3365  else
3366  {
3367  CurrentOrders.Clear();
3368  }
3369  }
3370  else
3371  {
3372  for (int i = 0; i < CurrentOrders.Count; i++)
3373  {
3374  var orderInfo = CurrentOrders[i];
3375  if (orderInfo.ManualPriority <= newOrder.ManualPriority)
3376  {
3377  CurrentOrders[i] = orderInfo.WithManualPriority(orderInfo.ManualPriority - 1);
3378  }
3379  }
3380  CurrentOrders.RemoveAll(order => order.ManualPriority <= 0);
3381  CurrentOrders.Add(newOrder);
3382  // Sort the current orders so the one with the highest priority comes first
3383  CurrentOrders.Sort((x, y) => y.ManualPriority.CompareTo(x.ManualPriority));
3384  }
3385  }
3386 
3387  private bool RemoveDuplicateOrders(Order order)
3388  {
3389  bool removed = false;
3390  int? priorityOfRemoved = null;
3391  for (int i = CurrentOrders.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)
3392  {
3393  var orderInfo = CurrentOrders[i];
3394  if (order.Identifier == orderInfo.Identifier)
3395  {
3396  priorityOfRemoved = orderInfo.ManualPriority;
3397  CurrentOrders.RemoveAt(i);
3398  removed = true;
3399  break;
3400  }
3401  }
3402 
3403  if (!priorityOfRemoved.HasValue) { return removed; }
3404 
3405  for (int i = 0; i < CurrentOrders.Count; i++)
3406  {
3407  var orderInfo = CurrentOrders[i];
3408  if (orderInfo.ManualPriority < priorityOfRemoved.Value)
3409  {
3410  CurrentOrders[i] = orderInfo.WithManualPriority(orderInfo.ManualPriority + 1);
3411  }
3412  }
3413 
3414  CurrentOrders.RemoveAll(order => order.ManualPriority <= 0);
3415  // Sort the current orders so the one with the highest priority comes first
3416  CurrentOrders.Sort((x, y) => y.ManualPriority.CompareTo(x.ManualPriority));
3417 
3418  return removed;
3419  }

3424  {

3426  if (orderInfo.Identifier == "dismissed") { return false; }
3427  if (orderInfo.ManualPriority < 1) { return false; }
3428  return true;
3429  });
3430  }

3470  public void Speak(string message, ChatMessageType? messageType = null, float delay = 0.0f, Identifier identifier = default, float minDurationBetweenSimilar = 0.0f)
3471  {
3472  if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient) { return; }
3473  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(message)) { return; }
3474 
3475  if (SpeechImpediment >= 100.0f) { return; }
3476 
3477  if (prevAiChatMessages.ContainsKey(identifier) &&
3478  prevAiChatMessages[identifier] < Timing.TotalTime - minDurationBetweenSimilar)
3479  {
3480  prevAiChatMessages.Remove(identifier);
3481  }
3482 
3483  //already sent a similar message a moment ago
3484  if (identifier != Identifier.Empty && minDurationBetweenSimilar > 0.0f &&
3485  (aiChatMessageQueue.Any(m => m.Identifier == identifier) || prevAiChatMessages.ContainsKey(identifier)))
3486  {
3487  return;
3488  }
3489  aiChatMessageQueue.Add(new AIChatMessage(message, messageType, identifier, delay));
3490  }
3491 
3492  private void UpdateAIChatMessages(float deltaTime)
3493  {
3494  if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient) { return; }
3495 
3496  List<AIChatMessage> sentMessages = new List<AIChatMessage>();
3497  foreach (AIChatMessage message in aiChatMessageQueue)
3498  {
3499  message.SendDelay -= deltaTime;
3500  if (message.SendDelay > 0.0f) { continue; }
3501 
3502  if (message.MessageType == null)
3503  {
3504  message.MessageType = ChatMessage.CanUseRadio(this) ? ChatMessageType.Radio : ChatMessageType.Default;
3505  }
3506 #if CLIENT
3507  if (GameMain.GameSession?.CrewManager != null && GameMain.GameSession.CrewManager.IsSinglePlayer)
3508  {
3509  string modifiedMessage = ChatMessage.ApplyDistanceEffect(message.Message, message.MessageType.Value, this, Controlled);
3510  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(modifiedMessage))
3511  {
3512  GameMain.GameSession.CrewManager.AddSinglePlayerChatMessage(info.Name, modifiedMessage, message.MessageType.Value, this);
3513  }
3514  }
3515 #endif
3516 #if SERVER
3517  if (GameMain.Server != null && message.MessageType != ChatMessageType.Order)
3518  {
3519  GameMain.Server.SendChatMessage(message.Message, message.MessageType.Value, null, this);
3520  }
3521 #endif
3522  ShowSpeechBubble(2.0f, ChatMessage.MessageColor[(int)message.MessageType.Value]);
3523  sentMessages.Add(message);
3524  }
3525 
3526  foreach (AIChatMessage sent in sentMessages)
3527  {
3528  sent.SendTime = Timing.TotalTime;
3529  aiChatMessageQueue.Remove(sent);
3530  if (sent.Identifier != Identifier.Empty)
3531  {
3532  prevAiChatMessages[sent.Identifier] = (float)sent.SendTime;
3533  }
3534  }
3535 
3536  if (prevAiChatMessages.Count > 100)
3537  {
3538  HashSet<Identifier> toRemove = new HashSet<Identifier>();
3539  foreach (KeyValuePair<Identifier,float> prevMessage in prevAiChatMessages)
3540  {
3541  if (prevMessage.Value < Timing.TotalTime - 60.0f)
3542  {
3543  toRemove.Add(prevMessage.Key);
3544  }
3545  }
3546  foreach (Identifier identifier in toRemove)
3547  {
3548  prevAiChatMessages.Remove(identifier);
3549  }
3550  }
3551  }
