3573  public AttackResult ApplyAttack(Character attacker, Vector2 worldPosition, Attack attack, float deltaTime, bool playSound = false, Limb targetLimb = null, float penetration = 0f)
3574  {
3575  if (Removed)
3576  {
3577  string errorMsg = "Tried to apply an attack to a removed character ([name]).\n" + Environment.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace();
3578  DebugConsole.ThrowError(errorMsg.Replace("[name]", Name));
3579  GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce("Character.ApplyAttack:RemovedCharacter", GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Error, errorMsg.Replace("[name]", SpeciesName.Value));
3580  return new AttackResult();
3581  }
3582 
3583  Limb limbHit = targetLimb;
3584 
3585  float attackImpulse = attack.TargetImpulse + attack.TargetForce * attack.ImpactMultiplier * deltaTime;
3586 
3587  AbilityAttackData attackData = new AbilityAttackData(attack, this, attacker);
3588  IEnumerable<Affliction> attackAfflictions;
3589  if (attackData.Afflictions != null)
3590  {
3591  attackAfflictions = attackData.Afflictions.Union(attack.Afflictions.Keys);
3592  }
3593  else
3594  {
3595  attackAfflictions = attack.Afflictions.Keys;
3596  }
3597 
3598  var attackResult = targetLimb == null ?
3599  AddDamage(worldPosition, attackAfflictions, attack.Stun, playSound, attackImpulse, out limbHit, attacker, attack.DamageMultiplier * attackData.DamageMultiplier) :
3600  DamageLimb(worldPosition, targetLimb, attackAfflictions, attack.Stun, playSound, attackImpulse, attacker, attack.DamageMultiplier * attackData.DamageMultiplier, penetration: penetration + attackData.AddedPenetration, shouldImplode: attackData.ShouldImplode);
3601 
3602  if (attacker != null)
3603  {
3604  var abilityAttackResult = new AbilityAttackResult(attackResult);
3605  attacker.CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnAttackResult, abilityAttackResult);
3606  CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnAttackedResult, abilityAttackResult);
3607  }
3608 
3609  if (limbHit == null) { return new AttackResult(); }
3610  Vector2 forceWorld = attack.TargetImpulseWorld + attack.TargetForceWorld * attack.ImpactMultiplier;
3611  if (attacker != null)
3612  {
3613  forceWorld.X *= attacker.AnimController.Dir;
3614  }
3615  limbHit.body?.ApplyLinearImpulse(forceWorld * deltaTime, maxVelocity: NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity);
3616  var mainLimb = limbHit.character.AnimController.MainLimb;
3617  if (limbHit != mainLimb)
3618  {
3619  // Always add force to mainlimb
3620  mainLimb.body?.ApplyLinearImpulse(forceWorld * deltaTime, maxVelocity: NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity);
3621  }
3622 #if SERVER
3623  if (attacker is Character attackingCharacter && attackingCharacter.AIController == null)
3624  {
3625  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
3626  sb.Append(GameServer.CharacterLogName(this) + " attacked by " + GameServer.CharacterLogName(attackingCharacter) + ".");
3627  if (attackResult.Afflictions != null)
3628  {
3629  foreach (Affliction affliction in attackResult.Afflictions)
3630  {
3631  if (affliction.Strength == 0.0f) continue;
3632  sb.Append($" {affliction.Prefab.Name}: {affliction.Strength}");
3633  }
3634  }
3635  GameServer.Log(sb.ToString(), ServerLog.MessageType.Attack);
3636  }
3637 #endif
3638  // Don't allow beheading for monster attacks, because it happens too frequently (crawlers/tigerthreshers etc attacking each other -> they will most often target to the head)
3639  TrySeverLimbJoints(limbHit, attack.SeverLimbsProbability, attackResult.Damage, allowBeheading: attacker == null || attacker.IsHuman || attacker.IsPlayer, attacker: attacker);
3640 
3641  return attackResult;
3642  }
3643 
3644  public void TrySeverLimbJoints(Limb targetLimb, float severLimbsProbability, float damage, bool allowBeheading, Character attacker = null)
3645  {
3646  if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient) { return; }
3647 #if DEBUG
3648  if (targetLimb.character != this)
3649  {
3650  DebugConsole.ThrowError($"{Name} is attempting to sever joints of {targetLimb.character.Name}!");
3651  return;
3652  }
3653 #endif
3654  if (damage < targetLimb.Params.MinSeveranceDamage) { return; }
3655  if (!IsDead)
3656  {
3657  if (!allowBeheading && targetLimb.type == LimbType.Head) { return; }
3658  if (!targetLimb.CanBeSeveredAlive) { return; }
3659  }
3660  bool wasSevered = false;
3661  float random = Rand.Value();
3662  foreach (LimbJoint joint in AnimController.LimbJoints)
3663  {
3664  if (!joint.CanBeSevered) { continue; }
3665  // Limb A is where we start creating the joint and LimbB is where the joint ends.
3666  // Normally the joints have been created starting from the body, in which case we'd want to use LimbB e.g. to severe a hand when it's hit.
3667  // But heads are a different case, because many characters have been created so that the head is first and then comes the rest of the body.
3668  // If this is the case, we'll have to use LimbA to decapitate the creature when it's hit on the head. Otherwise decapitation could happen only when we hit the body, not the head.
3669  var referenceLimb = targetLimb.type == LimbType.Head && targetLimb.Params.ID == 0 ? joint.LimbA : joint.LimbB;
3670  if (referenceLimb != targetLimb) { continue; }
3671  float probability = severLimbsProbability;
3672  if (!IsDead)
3673  {
3674  probability *= joint.Params.SeveranceProbabilityModifier;
3675  }
3676  if (probability <= 0) { continue; }
3677  if (random > probability) { continue; }
3678  bool severed = AnimController.SeverLimbJoint(joint);
3679  if (!wasSevered)
3680  {
3681  wasSevered = severed;
3682  }
3683  if (severed)
3684  {
3685  Limb otherLimb = joint.LimbA == targetLimb ? joint.LimbB : joint.LimbA;
3686  otherLimb.body.ApplyLinearImpulse(targetLimb.LinearVelocity * targetLimb.Mass, maxVelocity: NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity * 0.5f);
3687  if (attacker != null)
3688  {
3689  if (statusEffects.TryGetValue(ActionType.OnSevered, out var statusEffectList))
3690  {
3691  foreach (var statusEffect in statusEffectList)
3692  {
3693  statusEffect.SetUser(attacker);
3694  }
3695  }
3696  if (targetLimb.StatusEffects.TryGetValue(ActionType.OnSevered, out var limbStatusEffectList))
3697  {
3698  foreach (var statusEffect in limbStatusEffectList)
3699  {
3700  statusEffect.SetUser(attacker);
3701  }
3702  }
3703  }
3704  ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.OnSevered, 1.0f);
3705  targetLimb.ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.OnSevered, 1.0f);
3706  }
3707  }
3708  if (wasSevered && targetLimb.character.AIController is EnemyAIController enemyAI)
3709  {
3710  enemyAI.ReevaluateAttacks();
3711  }
3712  }
3713 
3714  public AttackResult AddDamage(Vector2 worldPosition, IEnumerable<Affliction> afflictions, float stun, bool playSound, float attackImpulse = 0.0f, Character attacker = null, float damageMultiplier = 1f)

3716  return AddDamage(worldPosition, afflictions, stun, playSound, attackImpulse, out _, attacker, damageMultiplier: damageMultiplier);

3719  public AttackResult AddDamage(Vector2 worldPosition, IEnumerable<Affliction> afflictions, float stun, bool playSound, float attackImpulse, out Limb hitLimb, Character attacker = null, float damageMultiplier = 1)
3720  {
3721  hitLimb = null;
3722 
3723  if (Removed) { return new AttackResult(); }
3724 
3725  float closestDistance = 0.0f;
3726  foreach (Limb limb in AnimController.Limbs)
3727  {
3728  float distance = Vector2.DistanceSquared(worldPosition, limb.WorldPosition);
3729  if (hitLimb == null || distance < closestDistance)
3730  {
3731  hitLimb = limb;
3732  closestDistance = distance;
3733  }
3734  }
3735 
3736  return DamageLimb(worldPosition, hitLimb, afflictions, stun, playSound, attackImpulse, attacker, damageMultiplier);
3737  }

3748  if (!IsOnPlayerTeam) { return; }
3749  if (CreatureMetrics.Instance.Killed.Contains(target.SpeciesName)) { return; }
3750  CreatureMetrics.Instance.Killed.Add(target.SpeciesName);
3751  AddEncounter(target);

3762  public AttackResult DamageLimb(Vector2 worldPosition, Limb hitLimb, IEnumerable<Affliction> afflictions, float stun, bool playSound, float attackImpulse, Character attacker = null, float damageMultiplier = 1, bool allowStacking = true, float penetration = 0f, bool shouldImplode = false)
3763  {
3764  if (Removed) { return new AttackResult(); }
3765 
3766  //character inside the sub received damage from a monster outside the sub
3767  //can happen during normal gameplay if someone for example fires a ranged weapon from outside,
3768  //the intention of this error message is to diagnose an issue with monsters being able to damage characters from outside
3769 
3770  // Disabled, because this happens every now and then when the monsters can get in and out of the sub.
3771 
3772 // if (attacker?.AIController is EnemyAIController && Submarine != null && attacker.Submarine == null)
3773 // {
3774 // string errorMsg = $"Character {Name} received damage from outside the sub while inside (attacker: {attacker.Name})";
3775 // GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce("Character.DamageLimb:DamageFromOutside" + Name + attacker.Name,
3776 // GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Warning,
3777 // errorMsg + "\n" + Environment.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace());
3778 //#if DEBUG
3779 // DebugConsole.ThrowError(errorMsg);
3780 //#endif
3781 // }
3782 
3783  SetStun(stun);
3784 
3785  if (attacker != null && attacker != this && GameMain.NetworkMember != null && !GameMain.NetworkMember.ServerSettings.AllowFriendlyFire)
3786  {
3787  if (attacker.TeamID == TeamID)
3788  {
3789  afflictions = afflictions.Where(a => a.Prefab.IsBuff);
3790  if (!afflictions.Any()) { return new AttackResult(); }
3791  }
3792  }
3793 
3794 #if CLIENT
3795  if (Params.UseBossHealthBar && Controlled != null && Controlled.teamID == attacker?.teamID)
3796  {
3797  CharacterHUD.ShowBossHealthBar(this);
3798  }
3799 #endif
3800 
3801  Vector2 dir = hitLimb.WorldPosition - worldPosition;
3802  if (Math.Abs(attackImpulse) > 0.0f)
3803  {
3804  Vector2 diff = dir;
3805  if (diff == Vector2.Zero) { diff = Rand.Vector(1.0f); }
3806  Vector2 impulse = Vector2.Normalize(diff) * attackImpulse;
3807  Vector2 hitPos = hitLimb.SimPosition + ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(diff);
3808  hitLimb.body.ApplyLinearImpulse(impulse, hitPos, maxVelocity: NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity * 0.5f);
3809  var mainLimb = hitLimb.character.AnimController.MainLimb;
3810  if (hitLimb != mainLimb)
3811  {
3812  // Always add force to mainlimb
3813  mainLimb.body.ApplyLinearImpulse(impulse, hitPos, maxVelocity: NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity);
3814  }
3815  }
3816  bool wasDead = IsDead;
3817  Vector2 simPos = hitLimb.SimPosition + ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(dir);
3818  float prevVitality = CharacterHealth.Vitality;
3819  AttackResult attackResult = hitLimb.AddDamage(simPos, afflictions, playSound, damageMultiplier: damageMultiplier, penetration: penetration, attacker: attacker);
3820  CharacterHealth.ApplyDamage(hitLimb, attackResult, allowStacking);
3821  if (shouldImplode)
3822  {
3823  // Only used by assistant's True Potential talent. Has to run here in order to properly give kill credit when it activates.
3824  Implode();
3825  }
3826 
3827  if (attacker != this)
3828  {
3829  OnAttacked?.Invoke(attacker, attackResult);
3830  OnAttackedProjSpecific(attacker, attackResult, stun);
3831  if (!wasDead)
3832  {
3833  TryAdjustAttackerSkill(attacker, CharacterHealth.Vitality - prevVitality);
3834  }
3835  };
3836  if (attackResult.Damage > 0)
3837  {
3838  LastDamage = attackResult;
3839  if (attacker != null)
3840  {
3841  AddAttacker(attacker, attackResult.Damage);
3842  AddEncounter(attacker);
3843  attacker.AddEncounter(this);
3844  }
3845  ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.OnDamaged, 1.0f);
3846  hitLimb.ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.OnDamaged, 1.0f);
3847  }
3848 
3849  return attackResult;
3850  }

3854  public void TryAdjustAttackerSkill(Character attacker, float healthChange)
3855  {
3856  if (attacker == null) { return; }
3857 
3858  bool isEnemy = AIController is EnemyAIController || TeamID != attacker.TeamID;
3859  if (isEnemy)
3860  {
3861  if (healthChange < 0.0f)
3862  {
3863  float attackerSkillLevel = attacker.GetSkillLevel("weapons");
3864  attacker.Info?.IncreaseSkillLevel("weapons".ToIdentifier(),
3865  -healthChange * SkillSettings.Current.SkillIncreasePerHostileDamage / Math.Max(attackerSkillLevel, 1.0f));
3866  }
3867  }
3868  else if (healthChange > 0.0f)
3869  {
3870  float attackerSkillLevel = attacker.GetSkillLevel("medical");
3871  attacker.Info?.IncreaseSkillLevel("medical".ToIdentifier(),
3872  healthChange * SkillSettings.Current.SkillIncreasePerFriendlyHealed / Math.Max(attackerSkillLevel, 1.0f));
3873  }
3874  }

3882  public void SetStun(float newStun, bool allowStunDecrease = false, bool isNetworkMessage = false)
3883  {
3884  if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient && !isNetworkMessage) { return; }
3885  if (Screen.Selected != GameMain.GameScreen) { return; }
3886  if (newStun > 0 && Params.Health.StunImmunity) { return; }
3887  if ((newStun <= Stun && !allowStunDecrease) || !MathUtils.IsValid(newStun)) { return; }
3888  if (Math.Sign(newStun) != Math.Sign(Stun))
3889  {
3890  AnimController.ResetPullJoints();
3891  }
3892  CharacterHealth.Stun = newStun;
3893  if (newStun > 0.0f)
3894  {
3895  SelectedConstruction = null;
3896  }
3897  HealthUpdateInterval = 0.0f;
3898  }

3900  private readonly List<ISerializableEntity> targets = new List<ISerializableEntity>();
3901  public void ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType actionType, float deltaTime)
3902  {
3903  if (actionType == ActionType.OnEating)
3904  {
3905  float eatingRegen = Params.Health.HealthRegenerationWhenEating;
3906  if (eatingRegen > 0)
3907  {
3908  CharacterHealth.ReduceAfflictionOnAllLimbs("damage".ToIdentifier(), eatingRegen * deltaTime);
3909  }
3910  }
3911  if (!statusEffects.TryGetValue(actionType, out var statusEffectList)) { return; }
3912  foreach (StatusEffect statusEffect in statusEffectList)
3913  {
3914  if (statusEffect.type == ActionType.OnDamaged)
3915  {
3916  if (!statusEffect.HasRequiredAfflictions(LastDamage)) { continue; }
3917  if (statusEffect.OnlyPlayerTriggered)
3918  {
3919  if (LastAttacker == null || !LastAttacker.IsPlayer)
3920  {
3921  continue;
3922  }
3923  }
3924  }
3925  if (statusEffect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.NearbyItems) ||
3926  statusEffect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.NearbyCharacters))
3927  {
3928  targets.Clear();
3929  targets.AddRange(statusEffect.GetNearbyTargets(WorldPosition, targets));
3930  statusEffect.Apply(actionType, deltaTime, this, targets);
3931  }
3932  else if (statusEffect.targetLimbs != null)
3933  {
3934  foreach (var limbType in statusEffect.targetLimbs)
3935  {
3936  if (statusEffect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.AllLimbs))
3937  {
3938  // Target all matching limbs
3939  foreach (var limb in AnimController.Limbs)
3940  {
3941  if (limb.IsSevered) { continue; }
3942  if (limb.type == limbType)
3943  {
3944  statusEffect.sourceBody = limb.body;
3945  statusEffect.Apply(actionType, deltaTime, this, limb);
3946  }
3947  }
3948  }
3949  else if (statusEffect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.Limb))
3950  {
3951  // Target just the first matching limb
3952  Limb limb = AnimController.GetLimb(limbType);
3953  if (limb != null)
3954  {
3955  statusEffect.sourceBody = limb.body;
3956  statusEffect.Apply(actionType, deltaTime, this, limb);
3957  }
3958  }
3959  else if (statusEffect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.LastLimb))
3960  {
3961  // Target just the last matching limb
3962  Limb limb = AnimController.Limbs.LastOrDefault(l => l.type == limbType && !l.IsSevered && !l.Hidden);
3963  if (limb != null)
3964  {
3965  statusEffect.sourceBody = limb.body;
3966  statusEffect.Apply(actionType, deltaTime, this, limb);
3967  }
3968  }
3969  }
3970  }
3971  if (statusEffect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.This) || statusEffect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.Character))
3972  {
3973  statusEffect.Apply(actionType, deltaTime, this, this);
3974  }
3975  }
3976  if (actionType != ActionType.OnDamaged && actionType != ActionType.OnSevered)
3977  {
3978  // OnDamaged is called only for the limb that is hit.
3979  AnimController.Limbs.ForEach(l => l.ApplyStatusEffects(actionType, deltaTime));
3980  }
3981  //OnActive effects are handled by the afflictions themselves
3982  if (actionType != ActionType.OnActive)
3983  {
3984  CharacterHealth.ApplyAfflictionStatusEffects(actionType);
3985  }
3986  }

4005  public void BreakJoints()
4006  {
4007  Vector2 centerOfMass = AnimController.GetCenterOfMass();
4008  foreach (Limb limb in AnimController.Limbs)
4009  {
4010  if (limb.IsSevered) { continue; }
4011  limb.AddDamage(limb.SimPosition, 500.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, false);
4012 
4013  Vector2 diff = centerOfMass - limb.SimPosition;
4014 
4015  if (!MathUtils.IsValid(diff))
4016  {
4017  string errorMsg = "Attempted to apply an invalid impulse to a limb in Character.BreakJoints (" + diff + "). Limb position: " + limb.SimPosition + ", center of mass: " + centerOfMass + ".";
4018  DebugConsole.ThrowError(errorMsg);
4019  GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce("Ragdoll.GetCenterOfMass", GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Error, errorMsg);
4020  return;
4021  }
4022 
4023  if (diff == Vector2.Zero) { continue; }
4024  limb.body.ApplyLinearImpulse(diff * 50.0f, maxVelocity: NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity);
4025  }
4026 
4027  ImplodeFX();
4028 
4029  foreach (var joint in AnimController.LimbJoints)
4030  {
4031  if (joint.LimbA.type == LimbType.Head || joint.LimbB.type == LimbType.Head) { continue; }
4032  if (joint.revoluteJoint != null)
4033  {
4034  joint.revoluteJoint.LimitEnabled = false;
4035  }
4036  }
4037  }

4270  public static void SaveInventory(Inventory inventory, XElement parentElement)
4271  {

4280  itemElement.Add(new XAttribute("i", string.Join(",", slotIndices)));
4281 
4282  foreach (ItemContainer container in item.GetComponents<ItemContainer>())
4283  {
4284  XElement childInvElement = new XElement("inventory");
4285  itemElement.Add(childInvElement);

4304  private void SpawnInventoryItemsRecursive(Inventory inventory, ContentXElement element, List<Item> extraDuffelBags)
4305  {
4306  foreach (var itemElement in element.Elements())
4307  {
4308  var newItem = Item.Load(itemElement, inventory.Owner.Submarine, createNetworkEvent: true, idRemap: IdRemap.DiscardId);
4309  if (newItem == null) { continue; }
4310 
4311  if (!MathUtils.NearlyEqual(newItem.Condition, newItem.MaxCondition) &&
4312  GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsServer)
4313  {
4314  newItem.CreateStatusEvent();
4315  }
4316 #if SERVER
4317  newItem.GetComponent<Terminal>()?.SyncHistory();
4318 #endif
4319  int[] slotIndices = itemElement.GetAttributeIntArray("i", new int[] { 0 });
4320  if (!slotIndices.Any())
4321  {
4322  DebugConsole.ThrowError("Invalid inventory data in character \"" + Name + "\" - no slot indices found");
4323  continue;
4324  }
4325 
4326  //make sure there's no other item in the slot
4327  //this should not happen normally, but can occur if the character is accidentally given new job items while also loading previous items in the campaign
4328  for (int i = 0; i < inventory.Capacity; i++)
4329  {
4330  if (slotIndices.Contains(i))
4331  {
4332  var existingItem = inventory.GetItemAt(i);
4333  if (existingItem != null && existingItem != newItem && (((MapEntity)existingItem).Prefab != ((MapEntity)newItem).Prefab || existingItem.Prefab.MaxStackSize == 1))
4334  {
4335  DebugConsole.ThrowError($"Error while loading character inventory data. The slot {i} was already occupied by the item \"{existingItem.Name} ({existingItem.ID})\" when loading the item \"{newItem.Name} ({newItem.ID})\"");
4336  existingItem.Drop(null, createNetworkEvent: false);
4337  }
4338  }
4339  }
4340 
4341  bool canBePutInOriginalInventory = true;
4342  if (slotIndices[0] >= inventory.Capacity)
4343  {
4344  canBePutInOriginalInventory = false;
4345  //legacy support: before item stacking was implemented, revolver for example had a separate slot for each bullet
4346  //now there's just one, try to put the extra items where they fit (= stack them)
4347  for (int i = 0; i < inventory.Capacity; i++)
4348  {
4349  if (inventory.CanBePutInSlot(newItem, i))
4350  {
4351  slotIndices[0] = i;
4352  canBePutInOriginalInventory = true;
4353  break;
4354  }
4355  }
4356  }
4357  else
4358  {
4359  canBePutInOriginalInventory = inventory.CanBePutInSlot(newItem, slotIndices[0], ignoreCondition: true);
4360  }
4361 
4362  if (canBePutInOriginalInventory)
4363  {
4364  inventory.TryPutItem(newItem, slotIndices[0], false, false, null);
4365  newItem.ParentInventory = inventory;
4366 
4367  //force the item to the correct slots
4368  // e.g. putting the item in a hand slot will also put it in the first available Any-slot,
4369  // which may not be where it actually was
4370  for (int i = 0; i < inventory.Capacity; i++)
4371  {
4372  if (slotIndices.Contains(i))
4373  {
4374  if (!inventory.GetItemsAt(i).Contains(newItem)) { inventory.ForceToSlot(newItem, i); }
4375  }
4376  else if (inventory.FindIndices(newItem).Contains(i))
4377  {
4378  inventory.ForceRemoveFromSlot(newItem, i);
4379  }
4380  }
4381  }
4382  else
4383  {
4384  // In case the inventory capacity is smaller than it was when saving:
4385  // 1) Spawn a new duffel bag if none yet spawned or if the existing ones aren't enough
4386  if (extraDuffelBags.None(i => i.OwnInventory.CanBePut(newItem)) && ItemPrefab.FindByIdentifier("duffelbag".ToIdentifier()) is ItemPrefab duffelBagPrefab)
4387  {
4388  var hull = Hull.FindHull(WorldPosition, guess: CurrentHull);
4389  var mainSub = Submarine.MainSubs.FirstOrDefault(s => s.TeamID == TeamID);
4390  if ((hull == null || hull.Submarine != mainSub) && mainSub != null)
4391  {
4392  var wp = WayPoint.GetRandom(spawnType: SpawnType.Cargo, sub: mainSub) ?? WayPoint.GetRandom(sub: mainSub);
4393  if (wp != null)
4394  {
4395  hull = Hull.FindHull(wp.WorldPosition);
4396  }
4397  }
4398  var newDuffelBag = new Item(duffelBagPrefab,
4399  hull != null ? CargoManager.GetCargoPos(hull, duffelBagPrefab) : Position,
4400  hull?.Submarine ?? Submarine);
4401  extraDuffelBags.Add(newDuffelBag);
4402 #if SERVER
4403  Spawner.CreateNetworkEvent(new EntitySpawner.SpawnEntity(newDuffelBag));
4404 #endif
4405  }
4406 
4407  // 2) Find a slot for the new item
4408  for (int i = 0; i < extraDuffelBags.Count; i++)
4409  {
4410  var duffelBag = extraDuffelBags[i];
4411  for (int j = 0; j < duffelBag.OwnInventory.Capacity; j++)
4412  {
4413  if (duffelBag.OwnInventory.TryPutItem(newItem, j, false, false, null))
4414  {
4415  newItem.ParentInventory = duffelBag.OwnInventory;
4416  break;
4417  }
4418  }
4419  }
4420  }
4421 
4422  int itemContainerIndex = 0;
4423  var itemContainers = newItem.GetComponents<ItemContainer>().ToList();
4424  foreach (var childInvElement in itemElement.Elements())
4425  {
4426  if (itemContainerIndex >= itemContainers.Count) break;
4427  if (!childInvElement.Name.ToString().Equals("inventory", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase)) { continue; }
4428  SpawnInventoryItemsRecursive(itemContainers[itemContainerIndex].Inventory, childInvElement, extraDuffelBags);
4429  itemContainerIndex++;
4430  }
4431  }
4432  }

4458  private readonly List<Hull> visibleHulls = new List<Hull>();
4459  private readonly HashSet<Hull> tempList = new HashSet<Hull>();
4464  public List<Hull> GetVisibleHulls()
4465  {
4466  visibleHulls.Clear();
4467  tempList.Clear();
4468  if (CurrentHull != null)
4469  {
4470  visibleHulls.Add(CurrentHull);
4471  var adjacentHulls = CurrentHull.GetConnectedHulls(true, 1);
4472  float maxDistance = 1000f;
4473  foreach (var hull in adjacentHulls)
4474  {
4475  if (hull.ConnectedGaps.Any(g => g.Open > 0.9f && g.linkedTo.Contains(CurrentHull) &&
4476  Vector2.DistanceSquared(g.WorldPosition, WorldPosition) < Math.Pow(maxDistance / 2, 2)))
4477  {
4478  if (Vector2.DistanceSquared(hull.WorldPosition, WorldPosition) < Math.Pow(maxDistance, 2))
4479  {
4480  visibleHulls.Add(hull);
4481  }
4482  }
4483  }
4484  visibleHulls.AddRange(CurrentHull.GetLinkedEntities(tempList, filter: h =>
4485  {
4486  // Ignore adjacent hulls because they were already handled above
4487  if (adjacentHulls.Contains(h))
4488  {
4489  return false;
4490  }
4491  else
4492  {
4493  if (h.ConnectedGaps.Any(g =>
4494  g.Open > 0.9f &&
4495  Vector2.DistanceSquared(g.WorldPosition, WorldPosition) < Math.Pow(maxDistance / 2, 2) &&
4496  CanSeeTarget(g)))
4497  {
4498  return Vector2.DistanceSquared(h.WorldPosition, WorldPosition) < Math.Pow(maxDistance, 2);
4499  }
4500  else
4501  {
4502  return false;
4503  }
4504  }
4505  }));
4506  }
4507  return visibleHulls;
4508  }

4510  public Vector2 GetRelativeSimPosition(ISpatialEntity target, Vector2? worldPos = null)
4511  {
4512  Vector2 targetPos = target.SimPosition;
4513  if (worldPos.HasValue)
4514  {
4515  Vector2 wp = worldPos.Value;
4516  if (target.Submarine != null)
4517  {
4518  wp -= target.Submarine.Position;
4519  }
4520  targetPos = ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(wp);
4521  }
4522  if (Submarine == null && target.Submarine != null)
4523  {
4524  // outside and targeting inside
4525  targetPos += target.Submarine.SimPosition;
4526  }
4527  else if (Submarine != null && target.Submarine == null)
4528  {
4529  // inside and targeting outside
4530  targetPos -= Submarine.SimPosition;
4531  }
4532  else if (Submarine != target.Submarine)
4533  {
4534  if (Submarine != null && target.Submarine != null)
4535  {
4536  // both inside, but in different subs
4537  Vector2 diff = Submarine.SimPosition - target.Submarine.SimPosition;
4538  targetPos -= diff;
4539  }
4540  }
4541  return targetPos;
4542  }

4618  CharacterTalent characterTalent = new CharacterTalent(talentPrefab, this);
4619  characterTalents.Add(characterTalent);
4620  characterTalent.ActivateTalent(addingFirstTime);
4621  characterTalent.AddedThisRound = addingFirstTime;
4622 
4623  if (addingFirstTime)
4624  {
4625  OnTalentGiven(talentPrefab);
4626  GameAnalyticsManager.AddDesignEvent("TalentUnlocked:" + (info.Job?.Prefab.Identifier ?? "None".ToIdentifier()) + ":" + talentPrefab.Identifier,
4627  GameMain.GameSession?.Campaign?.TotalPlayTime ?? 0.0);
4628  }
4629  return true;
4630  }

4649  }
4650  }
4651  }
4652  return true;
4653  }

4693  public void GiveMoney(int amount)
4694  {
4695  if (!(GameMain.GameSession?.Campaign is { } campaign)) { return; }
4696  if (amount <= 0) { return; }
4697 
4698  Wallet wallet;
4699 #if SERVER
4700  if (!(campaign is MultiPlayerCampaign mpCampaign)) { throw new InvalidOperationException("Campaign on a server is not a multiplayer campaign"); }
4701  Client targetClient = null;
4702 
4703  foreach (Client client in GameMain.Server.ConnectedClients)
4704  {
4705  if (client.Character == this)
4706  {
4707  targetClient = client;
4708  break;
4709  }
4710  }
4711 
4712  wallet = targetClient is null ? mpCampaign.Bank : mpCampaign.GetWallet(targetClient);
4713 #else
4714  wallet = campaign.Wallet;
4715 #endif
4716 
4717  int prevAmount = wallet.Balance;
4718  wallet.Give(amount);
4719  OnMoneyChanged(prevAmount, wallet.Balance);
4720  }
4721 
4722 #if CLIENT
4723  public void SetMoney(int amount)
4724  {
4725  if (!(GameMain.GameSession?.Campaign is { } campaign)) { return; }
4726  if (amount == campaign.Wallet.Balance) { return; }
4727 
4728  int prevAmount = campaign.Wallet.Balance;
4729  campaign.Wallet.Balance = amount;
4730  OnMoneyChanged(prevAmount, campaign.Wallet.Balance);
4731  }
4732 #endif

4741  private readonly Dictionary<StatTypes, float> statValues = new Dictionary<StatTypes, float>();
4742 
4746  private readonly Dictionary<StatTypes, float> wearableStatValues = new Dictionary<StatTypes, float>();
4747 
4748  public float GetStatValue(StatTypes statType)
4749  {
4750  if (!IsHuman) { return 0f; }
4751 
4752  float statValue = 0f;
4753  if (statValues.TryGetValue(statType, out float value))
4754  {
4755  statValue += value;
4756  }
4757  if (CharacterHealth != null)
4758  {
4759  statValue += CharacterHealth.GetStatValue(statType);
4760  }
4761  if (Info != null)
4762  {
4763  // could be optimized by instead updating the Character.cs statvalues dictionary whenever the CharacterInfo.cs values change
4764  statValue += Info.GetSavedStatValue(statType);
4765  }
4766  if (wearableStatValues.TryGetValue(statType, out float wearableValue))
4767  {
4768  statValue += wearableValue;
4769  }
4770 
4771  return statValue;
4772  }
4773 
4774  public void OnWearablesChanged()
4775  {
4776  wearableStatValues.Clear();
4777  for (int i = 0; i < Inventory.Capacity; i++)
4778  {
4779  if (Inventory.SlotTypes[i] != InvSlotType.Any && Inventory.SlotTypes[i] != InvSlotType.LeftHand && Inventory.SlotTypes[i] != InvSlotType.RightHand
4780  && Inventory.GetItemAt(i)?.GetComponent<Wearable>() is Wearable wearable)
4781  {
4782  foreach (var statValuePair in wearable.WearableStatValues)
4783  {
4784  if (wearableStatValues.ContainsKey(statValuePair.Key))
4785  {
4786  wearableStatValues[statValuePair.Key] += statValuePair.Value;
4787  }
4788  else
4789  {
4790  wearableStatValues.Add(statValuePair.Key, statValuePair.Value);
4791  }
4792  }
4793  }
4794  }
4795  }
4796 
4797  public void ChangeStat(StatTypes statType, float value)
4798  {
4799  if (statValues.ContainsKey(statType))
4800  {
4801  statValues[statType] += value;
4802  }
4803  else
4804  {
4805  statValues.Add(statType, value);
4806  }
4807  }
4808 
4809  private static StatTypes GetSkillStatType(Identifier skillIdentifier)
4810  {
4811  // Using this method to translate between skill identifiers and stat types. Feel free to replace it if there's a better way
4812  switch (skillIdentifier.Value.ToLowerInvariant())
4813  {
4814  case "electrical":
4815  return StatTypes.ElectricalSkillBonus;
4816  case "helm":
4817  return StatTypes.HelmSkillBonus;
4818  case "mechanical":
4819  return StatTypes.MechanicalSkillBonus;
4820  case "medical":
4821  return StatTypes.MedicalSkillBonus;
4822  case "weapons":
4823  return StatTypes.WeaponsSkillBonus;
4824  default:
4825  return StatTypes.None;
4826  }
4827  }

4917  public AbilityAttackData(Attack sourceAttack, Character target, Character attacker)
4918  {
4919  SourceAttack = sourceAttack;
4920  Character = target;
4921  if (attacker != null)
4922  {
4923  Attacker = attacker;
4924  attacker.CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnAttack, this);
4925  target.CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnAttacked, this);
4926  DamageMultiplier *= 1 + attacker.GetStatValue(StatTypes.AttackMultiplier);
4927  if (attacker.TeamID == target.TeamID)
4928  {
4929  DamageMultiplier *= 1 + attacker.GetStatValue(StatTypes.TeamAttackMultiplier);
4930  }
4931  }
4932  }
4933  }
